products.title: Chube Hotend - Luke's Laboratory
products.body_html:
Tired of hotends that fail to deliver true high-performance? If you’re seeking an upgrade beyond the usual options, the Chube Hotend is your solution. Engineered for high flow, rapid printing speeds, and elevated temperatures, it offers a dependable and affordable design with patent-pending technology. Nothing else in this class combines these features so effectively. Your search ends here.

Massive meltzone in a compact hotend 

Available with a 42mm or 52mm meltzone in either Air or Conduction configurations, the Chube Hotend ranks among the most compact high-flow hotends available. Despite its generous meltzone size, it remains lightweight, with the Air version weighing 69g and the Conduction variant 74g. Its ratio of overall length to meltzone is exceptional, delivering unmatched grams per meltzone performance in a hotend capable of reaching 500°C.

Featuring Chalice Heatbreak technology

The Chalice Heatbreak uses aerospace materials combined with a hardened, lubricious surface treatment to provide an unrivaled printing experience. The thin, unibody break can withstand extreme temperatures and abrasive materials with ease while still preventing heat creep; keeping the surrounding components cold. The cup design of Chalice provides an ideal seat for the bowden tube and smoothly guides filament into the generous meltzone.

All components rated for 500c operation - including the provided metal cooling shield!

The Chube Hotend is constructed from premium materials engineered to withstand harsh polymers and demanding conditions. Each component is rated for operation at 500°C block temperature and 300°C ambient temperature. Its integrated stainless steel part-cooling shield not only safeguards against thermal shock but also ensures consistent polymer flow while reducing power consumption compared to silicone-based alternatives.

Extremely stiff for faster printing

The patent-pending tube [/tʃuːb/] structure of the Chube provides an exceptional high-speed printing experience. Strength is a core property of the Chube design. No more broken hotends from nozzle swaps. No more failed supports, or snapped heatbreaks, from barely-lifted prints. The strength and rigidity also translates to print quality - reducing deflection during acceleration provides a faster, cleaner print; increasing productivity while retaining part quality.

Uses Standardized Components

We believe in standards. The Chube Hotend maintains compatibility with common RepRap nozzles, cartridge heaters, and temperature sensors. All components are easily available and non-proprietary.

No more tiny threads - M3 only! 

However, some standards need to change for the better.  Operators can rejoice that the Chube Hotend is assembled and mounted with M3 hardware - not M2.5, not M1.6, no smaller hardware is anywhere on the unit. Not only does the Chube Hotend have M3 hardware, but the flathead screws are torx, which significantly reduces the likelihood of stripping. In addition to user-friendly hardware, the Chube Hotend also utilizes a new 6x18mm bolt pattern: this provides multiple fastening options, unidirectional strength, and a reliable connection to your motion system, even with plastic toolheads.

100% Manufactured and Assembled in the USA

What's included with my Chube Hotend?

  • 1 torx key
  • 1 hex key
  • 2 spare grub screws
  • 2 spare torx screws
  • Chube sticker
  • Luke's Lab sticker

MOUNTING INFORMATION:

Mass:

  • Air - 69g
  • Conduction 74g

products.title: Micro Swiss  FlowTech™ Hotend for Creality Ender 3 V3
products.body_html:
This kit comes with a plug and play Heater Core and thermistor, fully compatible with Ender 3 V3 printer. Stock z-height, build volume and firmware remains unchanged.

Upgrading your Ender 3 V3 to a FlowTech ecosystem allows you to use a full range of FlowTech, leak-proof nozzles including Diamondback nozzles that have a solid diamond tip - NOT a diamond coating.

Made in USA by Microswiss

Features:

  • Leak-Proof Nozzle:
    Tired of messy nozzle leaks that ruin your prints and waste filament? FlowTech Hotend combines nozzle and thermal break into one permanently sealed assembly that ensures a leak-proof hotend.

  • Cold Nozzle Change:
    Swapping out nozzles used to be a time-consuming and potentially hazardous task. With a FlowTech Hotend, nozzle changes are effortless, and there's no need for hot tightening, and you can do it with just one hand.

  • High-Flow Characteristics:
    Ceramic cylindrical heater and 28.6mm melt zone provides excellent volumetric flow rate.

  • All-Metal Design:
    Built to last! FlowTech hotend features an all-metal design that can handle most modern 3D printing filaments. The entire hotend is machined and assembled in-house, with quality control performed at multiple stages during the manufacturing process. At the end, each hotend undergoes a full thermal cycling test before it is packaged.

  • 300°C Max Temperature:
    This hotend is rated at 300°C temperature with a properly tuned NTC thermistor for each specific printer. This particular edition is perfectly tuned for Ender 3 V3 so no firmware changes are needed.

Supported Device:

  • Creality Ender 3 V3
  • Creality Ender 3 V3 Plus

What is Included:

  • 1x FlowTech™ Heater Core 
  • 1x Copper Thermal Adapter
  • 1x FlowTech™ Brass Plated 0.4mm Nozzle
  • 2x Titanium Mounting Screws
  • 1x Silicon Sock

products.title: Trianglelab Rapido Ace™ Hotend UHF (PT1000) Black
products.body_html:
The Trianglelab Rapido Ace™ Hotend UHF represents a significant advancement in compact hotend design. Despite its reduced footprint, it maintains full compatibility with legacy Rapido and Dragon mounting systems through included spacers. This hotend delivers exceptional performance through an extended melt zone and elevated flow capacity within its diminished envelope. The replaceable ceramic heating element reduces long-term maintenance costs while the integrated PT1000 temperature sensor provides precise, stable thermal readings for consistent extrusion control. The innovative split stainless steel flange minimises thermal conductivity losses from the heating block and protects the filament pathway during assembly. A dual-stage insulated heat sink design effectively isolates the heating block from mounting hardware, preventing unwanted heat transfer up the assembly and maintaining optimal thermal management throughout extended print sessions.

Note: You can run either HF or UHF by removing the MZE extender. This listing is only for UHF Edition PT1000

Features: 

  • Smaller heat sink size, but still compatible with previous Rapido or Dragon mounting parts using a spacers. Multiple mounting holes on the top allow for multi-angle mounting of your print head.
  • Longer melt zone and higher flow rate in the even smaller overall size.
  • Ceramic heating element is replaceable and more cost-effective to maintain.
  • Carefully designed internal temperature sensor for more accurate and stable heater block temperature readings.
  • The split stainless steel flange design reduces heat loss from the heating block and also reduces the potential for damage to the filament capillary path during tightening.
  • Two-stage insulated heatsink design prevents heat from the heating block mounting screws from being conducted further upwards. (See infrared image)
  • The tapered heatsink cooling section ensures effective and tight contact. The cold end of the heat breaker only comes into contact with the coldest top of the heatsink, ensuring that the cold end temperature of the heat breaker is as low as possible, reducing the likelihood of heat creep.
  • Maximum practical flow rate of 65mm³/S. (PETG@265℃ φ1.2mm nozzle)

For detailed documentation:

please see the following link:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1JpKY0K64ezeTtLR7X6bPHKADfP-oV6TX

products.title: BIQU Universal CPAP Turbo Fan Kit
products.body_html:
This universal CPAP turbo fan kit pairs medical-equipment-grade components from Wonsmart Motor with BIQU's custom controller adapter and purpose-built cabling. Installation is straightforward, no complex setup required. Connect the kit as you would a standard DC fan and you're ready to operate.

Key Features:

  • Enhanced Performance. Harness the power of our specially designed adapter plate, which unleashes the full potential of the brushless driver. Enjoy up to 6.5KPA air pressure, 45,000 RPM speed, and 14.7 CFM air volume. This results in a 15% overall performance boost, providing superior cooling, reducing the print head's weight, and increasing work efficiency.

  • Effortless Connectivity. Simplify your setup with quick-connect terminals that eliminate the need for crimping. The included 2-meter cable can be easily cut and routed to fit your printer layout, offering flexibility to meet various installation requirements.

  • Universal Compatibility. Our adapter board streamlines the wiring process and supports a wide voltage range from 5V to 24V. No special connection to the Raspberry Pi GPIO interface is required, enhancing versatility. Additionally, we provide a complete set of installation print files and screws compatible with Voron2.4.

  • Dustproof & Noise Reduction. The air intake mushroom head effectively prevents dust and reduces noise, extending the fan's lifespan and ensuring stable operation.

  • Top-Tier Brand Protection. By choosing the Wonsmart brand, you benefit from the high standards of medical device reliability and safety.

  • Premium Quality Components. Built with high-quality parts, our product promises an extended service life and reduced maintenance costs.

products.title: FlowTech™ Hotend for Bambu Lab X1 and P1 Series
products.body_html:
Microswiss FlowTech Hotend is designed with advanced features for optimized performance. Paired with Bondtech CHT High Flow Nozzles, this hotend delivers up to 50 mm³/sec* for ultra-fast printing without compromising quality. Installation is simple and plug-and-play, allowing you to integrate it seamlessly into your Bambu Lab Printers.

[At DREMC we are only stocking CM2 version, you can bundle with CHT or CM2 CHT with Hotend with a discount]

Unlike the original heater core, the FlowTech features a sealed heater core, providing the following benefits:

  • Enhanced Heat Retention: The sealed design efficiently traps heat within the core, ensuring stable and consistent printing temperatures.
  • Increased Durability: By protecting the heating element and thermistor, the sealed heater core reduces the risk of damage, extending the lifespan of the hotend.

An official collaboration between Microswiss and Bondtech brings the CHT High Flow nozzle to the FlowTech ecosystem. This nozzle incorporates proprietary CHT technology, specifically engineered to boost the flow rate and improve layer adhesion.

  • High Flow CHT
    The FlowTech nozzle, equipped with Bondtech CHT technology, can achieve a maximum volumetric flow rate of up to 50 mm³/sec *
  • Better layer adhesion
    More uniform layer deposition is achieved by splitting the filament flow into multiple chambers as it passes through the melt zone. This reduces gaps and weak points between layers

*If the CHT Nozzle option is selected

Changing the nozzle on a Bambu Lab printer usually requires removing the entire hotend. However, with the FlowTech hotend upgrade, the process becomes remarkably quick and easy.

The FlowTech nozzle, integrated with a heat break, allows you to change the nozzle without preheating the hotend. With a FlowTech Hotend, nozzle changes are effortless, requiring no hot tightening and can be done with just two fingers and provided 3D printed nozzle changing knob.

Made in USA by Microswiss

 Fit:

  • Bambu Lab X1C
  • Bambu Lab P1S
  • Bambu Lab P1P

 What's in the box

  • 1x FlowTech™ Heater Core for Bambu Lab
  • 1x Heatsink for Bambu Lab
  • 1x FlowTech 0.4mm Nozzle (CM2)
  • 2x Titanium hotend mounting screws
  • 1x Silicon Sock
  • 2x Fan mounting shoulder screws
  • 1x Printed Nozzle changing tool

Documentation:

products.title: NiteHawk 36 Toolhead by LDO (Rev C)
products.body_html:
The NiteHawk-36 by LDO is a toolboard with an RP2040 MCU, TMC2209 stepper driver, ADXL345 accelerometer, and USB port. Its USB Hub/Header connection simplifies setup and supports adding a webcam or eddy current probe.

Note: Current in stock is Rev C board with Rev A accessory as shown in picture #2 with fully moulded cable, orders from 3th April 2025. 

Documentation: 

Github: https://github.com/MotorDynamicsLab/Nitehawk-36

LDO Doc: https://docs.ldomotors.com/en/Toolboard/nitehawk-36

The LDO Nitehawk36 (NH36) USB Toolhead board has received (finally) a revised version, the v1.4, which addresses the issues present in earlier versions while maintaining its core features, including the integrated USB hub

Major Differences in v1.4

  1. New Toolhead Board:
    • A redesigned toolhead board with improved functionality while keeps almost the same layout and size format.
  2. New USB Breakout Board:
    • The USB breakout board has been updated, possibly for better connectivity or compatibility.
  3. Metal Shield on the Toolhead:
    • A metal shield has been added to the back of the toolhead. This encapsulated shield is designed to:
      • Protect the core components.
      • Improve durability.
      • Potentially enhance electromagnetic interference (EMI) shielding.
  4. More Mounting Points:
    • The revised design includes additional mounting points on the bottom of the board for better stability and compatibility with various setups.

Features

  • Convenient wiring, no more complicated and error prone breakout cables - nitehawk only requires 24V power and a USB connector to the RPI host.
  • USB Klipper connection, no additional software or hardware setup compared to CAN.
  • Secondary USB port, an onboard USB port allows you to connect a second USB device to your toolhead without running an additional umbilical cable.
  • Custom toolhead cable, a single combined USB data and power cable rated for drag chain use, but can also be used in umbilical configuration.
  • Convenient Input Shaping, run input shaper calibration at anytime with an onboard accelerometer.
  • Tacho enabled HEF, the hotend fan port is three pin tachometer compatible, allowing for additional diagnostics and safety.

products.title: LDO NEMA 17 Motor LDO-42STH34-1504AC (42-34 Stepper)
products.body_html:
LDO NEMA 17 stepper motor engineered for Creality printer upgrades. Direct replacement for OEM 42-34 motors (4004100024) on Z, X, and Y axes. Compatible with both 18mm and 22mm shaft pulleys, offering flexibility across axis configurations. Delivers reliable torque and precision positioning for consistent print quality and mechanical stability.

Motor Specification: 

  • NEMA 17.
  • 1.8° Step Angle.
  • 200 Steps Per Revolution.
  • 1.5 Amp
  • 4.5Kgf cm Holding Torque.
  • 40mm Body.
  • 18mm Output Shaft (5mm diameter) (D Shaft) or 22mm Output Shaft (5mm diameter) (D Shaft)

Documentation: 

More technical specifications and drawing in the datasheet: Datsheethttps://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0541/6638/8905/files/LDO-42STH34-1504AC_RevA_2.pdf?v=1721885608

* Please use provided wiring, otherwise if you using stock wiring you will need swap 2 center the pin on the connector on stepper motor end(https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000320084-stepper-motor-wiring). Creality Compatible (If you running URT board, you can increase max run_current(~0.7A) or adjust vref may be required to use full potential of the motor). If you able to cool the stepper you may increase the run current further. 

Suitable for Y Axis or X Axis, you will just need source a 20 teeth pulley, or Coupler for Z axis and motor shaft depending on where you plan to install motor on, double check clearance or existing motor shaft length.

products.title: Duet 3 Expansion Board 3HC
products.body_html:
The Duet 3 Expansion board is a CAN-FD connected, high current, full featured expansion board for the Duet 3 mainboards. Pair one of these expansion boards with a Duet 3 Mainboard 6HC, Duet 3 Mainboard 6XD or a Duet 3 Mini 5+ to control 3 high current stepper drivers, 3 high current loads, 6 fans and 6 IO channels. Further 3HC expansion boards, tool boards and 1XD expansion boards can be added to the CAN-FD bus if necessary to complete your machine design.

FEATURES
Processor   Powerful 32bit Atmel ARM Cortex-M4F microcontroller running at up to 120MHz
Connectivity  CAN-FD BUS for connection to Duet 3 Mainboards (compatible with the Duet 3 Mainboard 6HC, Duet 3 Mainboard 6XD and the Duet 3 Mini 5+)
Stepper Drivers    3x TMC2160/5160 high-current drivers with the latest Trinamic features. Maximum motor current 6.3A peak per phase (4.45A RMS)
High current outputs  3x5A PWM outputs for extruders and similar
Medium current outputs  6 PWM controllable outputs for fans or similar. 3 of these support 4 wire fans including tacho reading
IO  6I/O connectors with 3.3V output signal level and 30V-tolerant inputs.
Temperature measurement 3 thermistor/PT1000 inputs. Support for two temperature daughterboards for up to 4 PT100 or thermocouple sensors.
Supply Voltage 12-48V v1.02 and later; 12-32V v1.01 and earlier

Documentation

Hardware overview  GO TO DOCUMENTATION >

products.title: LDO Orbitool SO3 Toolboard Kit
products.body_html:
LDO Orbitool SO3 Toolboard Kit is a toolhead PCB with a STM32F042 MCU, TMC2209, Accelerometer all integrated into one board. The form factor is design for Orbiter V3 Extruder

Features:

  • Smokeless Features
  • Optimized for Smart Orbiter v3 shape and features
  • STM32F042 microcontroller running on 48MHz
  • Automotive USB communication with Raspberry PI
  • Onboard LIS2DW12 accelerometer
  • TMC2209 extruder stepper driver
  • Direct connection to SO3 integrated board
  • 1x PWM controlled part fan outputs
  • DC-DC converter based Hot-end fan driver, compatible with 12/24V fan types with RPM speed input signal
  • Hot-end temperature sensor input compatible with standard NTC or PT1000 temperature sensor types
  •  I/O for bed level sensor
  • X-Stop sensor input
  • Onboard temperature sensor
  • Advanced thermal management

Built in safety features (Smokeless Features):

  1. Active short circuit protected Hot - end output
  2. Active short circuit protected fan driver outputs
  3. Active Protection circuit against reverse power supply connection
  4. Protection against loss of GND supply
  5. Analog and digital inputs protected against short to +24V supply voltage
  6. USB data lines protected against short circuits to GND and +24V 
  7. RGB LED power supply pin protected against short to GND 
  8. EMI interference and ESD protection an all inputs and outputs 
  9. Heater thermal runaway protection in case of short between heater and sense thermistor wires

Documentation: 

Github: https://github.com/RobertLorincz/Orbiter-Toolboards

Project Information: https://www.orbiterprojects.com/so3/

products.title: Revo™ Six Prusa MK3 Edition Hot End Builder
products.body_html:
Introducing the new E3D Configurable Revo-lution! A Revo Kit contains a cold-side and a hot-side . With our builder you can order all of these in one place. 

NOTE: The Prusa edition has slightly shorter cables to match the original Prusa lengths. It also does not include the fan duct.

No machine redesign.  Revo Six is a top choice if you want to update your old E3D V6 setup to the latest generation of E3D HotEnd technology.It has the same height, the same diameter, and the same groove mount as the E3D V6, so it drops straight into V6-fitted machines without the hassle of redesigning print head mounts and accessories. Just fit it, connect the Revo HeaterCore, and you’re ready to 3D print. 

Ready for Revo.  Revo Six is designed to work with Revo Nozzles, so you can perform nozzle swaps with your fingers at room temperature without complex tools or hot tightening. Each Revo Nozzle is factory sealed, making it much simpler to use and more reliable than most HotEnd technology available today. 

Enhanced performance.  Revo Six uses a Revo HeaterCore, our latest HotEnd heating and sensing architecture. It reaches temperature much faster than a traditional aluminium HeaterBlock, and it’s much safer: a positive temperature coefficient (PTC) means the HeaterCore can’t melt at extreme temperatures, reducing hazards in the event of a thermal runaway. 

A new look. An anodised black heat sink distinguishes Revo Six from its predecessor, and every unit ships with a premium crystal-clear fan duct so your machine will stand out from the crowd.

products.title: E3D Revo™ Voron Edition RapidChange Hot End (Revo Voron) Builder
products.body_html:
Introducing the new E3D Configurable Revo-lution! A Revo Kit contains a cold-side and a hot-side . With our builder you can order all of these in one place. 

E3D developed this Revo-compatible cold side in collaboration with Team Voron. It’s intended for use with the Voron StealthBurner, which includes an integrated cold side fan. It’s compatible with our Revo ecosystem, so you can change nozzle size without tools or hot tightening using just your fingers.

  • Uses Revo Nozzles – change nozzles cold, no tools, no hot tightening
  • Works with a Revo HeaterCore for faster heat-ups
  • Rigid mounting using 4 x M3 x 0.5 bolts
  • Ultra-lightweight construction for improved speed performance
  • Ideal HotEnd for Voron StealthBurner
  • Heatsink is licensed under GPL V3
  • Compatible with Voron Afterburner/Stealth burner, Legacy, Switchwire, Trident, Voron 0, Voron 1, Voron 2

Ready for Revo. A groove at the bottom of the sink accepts a Revo HeaterCore spring. It’s compatible with our Revo ecosystem, so you can change nozzle without tools or hot tightening using just your fingers.

Complements your Voron. Includes an anodised red aluminium heatsink to complement your Voron accented parts.

Rigid mounting. This is a rigid mounted design that uses four M3 x 0.5 bolts to secure to your Voron 3D printer.

Open-source design. We’ve made this cold side (everything above the HeaterCore, including the receptacle for the Revo Nozzle) open hardware licensed under the GPL V3. This means if you have an alternative design for this, you are able to work with it.

What is Included: 

Configurator Hot Side packs contain 5 package types (Starter, High Flow, High Flow X, Genius 400 and Genius Metal). Each package type contains the following:

  • Starter:

    • 0.4mm Brass Nozzle
    • 0.6mm Brass Nozzle
    • 40W HeaterCore

  • High Flow:

    • 0.4mm Brass High Flow Nozzle
    • 0.6mm Brass High Flow Nozzle
    • 60W HeaterCore
    • BONUS 0.4mm Brass Nozzle
    • BONUS Revo Sock Pack

  • High Flow X:

    • 0.4mm ObXidian High Flow Nozzle
    • 0.6mm ObXidian High Flow Nozzle
    • 60W HeaterCore
    • BONUS 0.4mm Brass Nozzle
    • BONUS Revo Sock Pack

  • Genius 400:

    • 0.4mm ObXidian Nozzle
    • 0.6mm High Flow ObXidian Nozzle
    • 0.4mm Brass Non Planar Nozzle
    • 0.6mm HighTemperature (HT) Abrasive Nozzle
    • 60W HeaterCore
    • HT HotSide HP Heater
    • BONUS 0.25mm Brass Nozzle
    • BONUS Revo Sock Pack

  • Genius Metal:

    • 0.4mm ObXidian Nozzle
    • 0.6mm High Flow ObXidian Nozzle
    • 0.4mm Brass Non Planar Nozzle
    • 0.6mm HighTemperature (HT) Abrasive Nozzle
    • 0.4mm DiamondBack Nozzle
    • 60W HeaterCore
    • HT HotSide HP Heater
    • BONUS 0.25mm Brass Nozzle
    • BONUS Revo Sock Pack

products.title: Cartographer3D CNC Toolhead Mount
products.body_html:
Experience precision like never before with our Ultra-Light CNC'ed Mount, meticulously designed for seamless integration with the StealthBurner and Cartographer3D Probe.  

Note - Unfortunately this mount is not compatible with the Monalith Gantry system due to the fact it uses a reversed belt path and the 9mm belt version is not compatible with MGN9 rails. 

Now available for both 6mm and 9mm belts, and with 8.5mm UHF extenders

 Key Features:

  • Compatibility: Expertly tailored to fit both StealthBurner and the Cartographer3D Probe, offering a versatile solution for your printer.
  • Lightweight Design: Made from high-grade 6061 aluminum, this CNC'ed mount is ultra-lightweight at 25.7 grams, yet incredibly durable, enhancing the efficiency of your equipment without adding extra bulk.
  • Precision Engineering: CNC machining ensures precise dimensions and an impeccable fit, guaranteeing stability and reliability in every use.
  • Versatile Rail Compatibility: Designed to mount effortlessly on both MGN9 and MGN12 rails, providing unparalleled adaptability for various setups.
  • Easy Installation: Intuitive design allows for quick and hassle-free installation, enabling you to get up and running in no time.
  • Rigidity - Our CNC StealthBurner mount adds a level of rigidity not possible with printed parts. 
  • Enhanced Stability: The robust construction ensures that your StealthBurner and Cartographer3D Probe remain securely in place, delivering consistent accuracy during operation.

Included:

  • 1 x Cartographer3D CNC StealthBurner Mount
  • 2 x Belt Clamps and Bolts
  • 2 x BHCS M3 * 6 (for probe)

Compatibility 

  • Voron StealthBurner Toolhead
  • Any Toolhead compatible with Stealthburner (or Tap) carriage

NOTE - XOL's Nozzle Height is slightly higher than the StealthBrurner Nozzle point, meaning modifications to XOL design might be required. If using anything other than a STANDARD StealthBurner setup, please check against the CAD available here

products.title: Binky Encoder for ERCF by Mneuhaus TCRT5000 ERCF V2
products.body_html:
Designed and open-sourced by mneuhaus the Binky is a new and upgraded encoder for ERCF v2. This board is an improved Filament Encoder for ERCF, designed to make your 3D printing experience a whole lot smoother.

The creator of this board has taken the original TCRT5000 PCBs, analyzed the issues, and created a more reliable, headache-free alternative. To deal with the false readings, the creator of this board added a schmitt filter to the PCB, and like the TCRT5000 boards, and also included an LED.

What is Included:

Board is fully soldered with a 3 Pin JST XH connector.

Documentation:

products.title: Micro Swiss FlowTech™ Hotend for ELEGOO Neptune 4 / 4 Pro
products.body_html:
The FlowTech hotend is now available for Elegoo printers, starting with Neptune 4 and 4 Pro.

Installing this hotend on Elegoo Neptune 4 and 4 Pro printers is a very quick and easy process. The kit comes with a plug and play Heater Core, thermistor and a heatsink fully compatible with Neptune 4 and 4 Pro. 
Stock z-height, build volume and firmware remains unchanged.

Upgrading your Elegoo Neptune 4 and 4 Pro to a FlowTech ecosystem allows you to use a full range of FlowTech, leak-proof nozzles including Diamondback nozzles that have a solid diamond tip - NOT a diamond coating.

Made in USA by Micro Swiss

Features:

  • Leak-Proof Nozzle:
    Tired of messy nozzle leaks that ruin your prints and waste filament? FlowTech Hotend combines nozzle and thermal break into one permanently sealed assembly that ensures a leak-proof hotend.

  • Cold Nozzle Change:
    Swapping out nozzles used to be a time-consuming and potentially hazardous task. With a FlowTech Hotend, nozzle changes are effortless, and there's no need for hot tightening, and you can do it with just one hand.

  • High-Flow Characteristics:
    Ceramic cylindrical heater and 28.6mm melt zone provides excellent volumetric flow rate.

  • All-Metal Design:
    Built to last! FlowTech hotend features an all-metal design that can handle most modern 3D printing filaments. The entire hotend is machined and assembled in-house, with quality control performed at multiple stages during the manufacturing process. At the end, each hotend undergoes a full thermal cycling test before it is packaged.

  • 300°C Max Temperature:
    This hotend is rated at 300°C temperature with a properly tuned NTC thermistor for each specific printer. This particular edition is perfectly tuned for Elegoo Neptune 4 and 4 Pro so no firmware changes are needed.

Fit:

  • ELEGOO Neptune 4
  • ELEGOO Neptune 4 Pro

Documentation: 

  • Installation Instructions - PDF

products.title: PolyDryer™ Filament Dryer
products.body_html:
PolyDryer™ serves as a premier solution for drying and storing 3D filaments, offering protection from both dust and moisture. Using wet filament can cause issues like stringing, clogging, and uneven surface finishes, with these problems becoming more apparent during high-speed printing or most engineering/ carbon/ glass filled materials  .

PolyDryer™ is designed and co-developed by FabNotion

When drying meets storage. A new standard in filament care

products.title: PrintSmooth High-Performance Gearing Grease
products.body_html:
Keep your LGX Steel Drive Train and compatible all-metal extruder gear systems running smoothly with this premium gearing grease formulated to reduce friction and wear. Engineered for high-performance 3D printing applications, it extends component lifespan while maintaining consistent extrusion quality under demanding conditions.

What is Included: 

  • PrintSmooth Gearing Grease (Net weight: 2g)

Number of applications : approx. 10

Features: 

  • Use this gearing grease to lubricate the LGX Steel Drive Train and extend its service life.

  • Visually inspect the double main gear every 100 hours of service. Re-apply grease if there is none.

  • Every 6 months, twice a year, apply PrintSmooth to all steel drive train teeth and needle-bearings if you use your LGX Steel Drive Train for 15 hours per week or less.

  • Reduce this interval to 4 months, 3 times per year, if you are a more intensive user.

    Check the Maintenance Guides below for more detailed information.

    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1CkiVzZtmOw&feature=youtu.be

Compatible with the following product:

  • LGX Steel Drive Train
  • Other all metal gears set

Applicable on the following products:

products.title: TZ 3.0 Hotend For Bambu Labs X1 / P1P Compatible
products.body_html:
The Bambu Labs Hotend TZ 3.0 is a precision-engineered upgrade compatible with Bambu Labs X1 and P1P models. Designed for superior thermal performance and reliable extrusion, it ensures consistent print quality and efficient heat management. 

Features: 

  • The heat sink and heat break can be disassembled and locked by the side fixed shaft to reduce maintenance costs. 
  • The TC4 chromium zirconium copper and titanium heatbreak tube and the heat block increases the step surface at the bottom of the throat to completely eliminate the phenomenon of the nozzle falling off and reduces the possibility of leakage.
  • Unlike the stock bambu hotend, which use brass heater block constructions, which has know to cause cracking and leaking hotend, the heater block in this aftermarket hotend is copper with nickel plating which offer longer service life. 

What is Included:

  • 1x TZ 3.0 Bambu Labs Compatible Hotend (Suitable for X1/X1C and P1P/P1*)
  • 1x 0.4mm TZ Nozzle
  • 1x Spare Sock
  • 1x X1 Series Heater/thermistor
  • 1x Nozzle Tools

*Note: Heater, thermistor are not included for P1 Series, this kit only include X1, you can source spare or re-use existing one. 

X1 Bambu Hotend Heater and Thermistor :  https://store.dremc.com.au/products/bambu-style-rapido-v2-heater-cartridge-bean-style-thermistors

P1P Series Heater and Thermeristor :  https://store.dremc.com.au/products/bambu-p1-series-ceramic-heater-thermistors

Other Spares: 

  • Silicon Sock
  • TZ Nozzle (Harden Steel)
  • TZ Nozzle (Bi Metal Harden Steel + Copper)

Note; This hotend is design prominently users who want use bambu hotend on community toolhead as it allow you use any compatible V6 nozzle, for Bambu printer please use small nozzle from the kit as longer nozzle may cause issues on Bmabu Printers.

Documentation: 

Pre-installed nozzle has thread lock pre-applied at the factory, you are require to heat up above 250c to loosen thread lock to swap/change nozzle. Ensure you wrench to hold the heater block in place so its does not twist.

products.title: LGX Lite Pro Upgrade Kit for Creality K1 Max
products.body_html:
Note: This is usually a special order/back order product, lead time is usually 1-2 weeks if these are in stock from Bondtech. 

Is your Creality K1 Max falling short?
You have a way to make it much better.
Improve speed, surface quality, versatility and durability.
Invest 0.5x to get 2x the value.

Install Guide: https://www.bondtech.se/downloads/SetupGuides/bondtech_UPG01CRL41260_LGX_Lite_PRO_Upgrade_Kit_for_Creality_K1_K1C-setup_guide.pdf


If you have a LGX Lite Pro already, buy this XY-axis and extruder upgrade mounting set (Accessory Only).

This upgrade kit is compatible with the following 3D printers:

  • Creality K1 Max

Note that this upgrade kit is intended for a stock K1 Max and will not work with some custom mods, such as:

  • Other belt widths
  • Custom gantries
  • Altered belt paths

We also urge you to take extra care to use the setup guide, only use supplied fasteners where intended and very gently tighten screws. Do NOT use power tools when installing these parts.

To install on the Creality K1 Max, we recommend you also buy Bondtech CHT Vol nozzles.

We took our time to study these K1 type of units.
We understood they are 3D printers with high potential but showcasing some critical and addressable flaws.
Not only the extruders under-performs, the XY-axis motion was also under-performing or compromised in all the units we examined. Another weak point detected was the z-belt tensioner that will break eventually.
For those reasons we didn’t limit ourselves to just find a way to install a Bondtech eXtruder on them.
We decided to turn these into competitive systems. To make them Bondtech upgraded Creality 3D printers that can outperform even their biggest Chinese competitor.
We truly believe we did it.
They become precious machines after the upgrade.

This Upgrade set is based on Large Gears eXtruder LGX Lite Pro to use on the Creality K1 and K1C.
Buy this if you have a LGX Lite Pro eXtruder already.

The LGX Lite Pro Accessories Set for Creality K1 a Max‘s plastic parts are made of grey Polyamide (PA12) filled with Glass beads and dyed in Black.

Also compatible with the Bondtech LGX Lite V2 eXtruder (not recommended).

Product includes: (With Extruder)

  • 1x LGX (Large Gears eXtruder) Lite Pro
  • 1x LGX Lite PRO Accessories for Creality K1 Max
    • 1x LGX Lite PRO X-Carriage for Creality K1/Max

    • 1x X-Rods Holder for Creality K1/Max Right

Product includes: (Accessories Only)

  • 1x LGX Lite PRO X-Carriage for Creality K1/Max
  • 1x LGX Lite XHP-4 to Micro 4-PIN Adapter Cable

products.title: LDO Galileo 2 G2Z XL for Voron V2.4 / Micron Plus
products.body_html:
The G2 Z-Drive (G2Z XL), designed by JaredC01, is a compact Z-drive for Voron V2.4 and Micron printers. It features a 9:1 planetary gearbox and stepper motor without belts or pulleys (except the Z belt pulley), offering higher torque and better print resolution. Its larger stepper supports heavier gantries and holds position when powered off, with flexibility for user modifications beyond these printer models.

The XL version is ideal for Voron V2.4 builds over 300mm or larger Micron printers with heavier beds.

More Info on printed parts required: https://github.com/JaredC01/Galileo2

Does not include printed parts.

A custom-designed 9:1 MJF and Aluminum planetary gearbox, with a custom 9T stepper that features 20% higher surface area than the existing 10T designs (5mm tall spur gear vs 4mm tall spur gear) for increased wear protection and better power transfer from the stepper to the gearbox. The gearbox also follows the rules of planetary gearboxes, where the sun (spur) gear needs to be divisible by the number of planets for proper meshing and loading of the planets (3 planets, 9T spur).

See latest printer parts and configuration information: https://github.com/JaredC01/Galileo2

products.title: Cookiecad ABS Unicorn ABS Gradient Filament 1.75mm 1kg
products.body_html:
Cookiecad transition spools is to make sure every color is beautiful so no matter where you are in the spool, every print is beautiful.

This is Unicorn - it has three magical colors on one spool! The color will change over time, so small objects will only contain one color. You can print multiple items at a time, large items or increase infill to get more of the color change into a single print. The colors will fade from pink, to purple, to blue and back to pink. Every color in the transition is beautiful. This roll is so much fun to print with!

 

Empty Plastic Spool ~177g

Printing Settings

Recommend VOC/Air Filtering/fume extraction or print in well ventilated room with fume extraction. 

Enclosure Required

Nozzle Temperature 240°C - 260°C
Build Plate Temperature 90°C - 110°C
Build Surface Material Works well with most common build surfaces.
Build Surface Treatment Typically none required. Some surfaces such as glass work best with PVA glue stick or Magigoo .
Cooling Fan ON
Printing Speed 40 mm/s - 100 mm/s
Retraction The ideal retraction settings vary from printer to printer. If you find the retraction settings are causing gaps in your part, the following settings may help.
Direct Drive: Retraction distance of 0.5 - 1mm with retraction speed of 20mm/s
Bowden: Retraction distance of 2 - 3mm with retraction speed of 20 - 40mm/s
Drying Recommendation ~50°c for 4-6hrs (Only dry if filament is wet, over drying/repeat drying can damage filament) (Filament Dryer Guide)
Storage Keeping filament in an airtight container with new/dried desiccant.

Based on 0.4 mm nozzle. Printing conditions may vary with different printers and nozzle diameters.

products.title: Bigtreetech BTT Pi CB2 - Alternative to Raspberry PI CM4
products.body_html:
BIGTREETECH Pi CB2 are advanced single-board computers with enhanced computing and storage performance. Designed for 3D printer enthusiasts, they offer a more user-friendly and efficient DIY experience.

Key Features:

  • The Bigtreetech BTT Pi CB2 features a Rockchip RK3566 processor with 2GB RAM and 32GB eMMC storage. It also supports SD card and 2M SSD expansion, providing reliable performance for running Klipper on Debian, storing files, and handling surveillance videos.
  • The Bigtreetech BTT Pi CB2 supports DSI and CSI extensions, allowing cameras to connect via the DSI interface. It can connect to the BTT PITFT screen through the FPC port or to the BTT HDMI screen using the HDMI interface.
  • Support 5G Network Blazing-fast dual-band WiFi and reliable Gigabit Ethernet ensure seamless connectivity for remote printing and file transfers.

Documentation:

  • For BTT PI V2 Listing: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/bigtreetech-btt-pi-v1-2
  • Documentation: https://bttwiki.com/CB2.htm

Note:

  • Pi 2 does not have an SPI interface. If you need to use an SPI screen, you need to connect it with IO2 CAN or EBB and U2C.
  • The size of CB2 is the same as that of CB1/CB1 eMMC and Raspberry Pi 4B/CM4, but the size of Pi 2 is slightly longer than that of Raspberry Pi 4B. Please refer to the size chart of Pi 2 to choose the appropriate installation location.

Note: M.2 PCIE cannot be used as boot drive.

products.title: Bigtreetech CEB Can Expansion Board
products.body_html:
The BIGTREETECH CEB V1.0 is a CANbus interface board that fits 2020 extrusion profiles and installs easily without tools. It provides neat wiring through directional interfaces, multiple CAN connections, and strong protection against surges and static. Suitable for various motherboards, it’s ideal for both DIYers and professionals.

Features

  • The board’s compact size ensures it fits seamlessly with all standard 2020 printer aluminium extrusions, enabling a fast and straightforward installation.
  • Each CAN port includes ESD protection chips and filter capacitors to protect connected CAN tool boards from static damage.
    • TVS diodes are installed on the power inputs to protect connected CAN tool boards from surges and static damage.
  • Supports various interfaces for compatibility with most CAN devices in the market.
  • 120R terminal resistor selectable via jumper for DIY use.

Specifications

  • Dimensions: 137.5mm x 20mm
  • Power Input: DC 12-24V 5PCS
  • CAN Interface: 5x XH2.54 2-pin ports, 1x XT30 port, and 1x RJ11 port
  • Terminal Resistor: 120R, selectable via jumper

Documentation:

https://github.com/bigtreetech/CEB

IMPORTANT NOTE: (V1.1.1)
The Panda Touch is currently compatible with all Bambu Lab printer firmware versions up until:
- P1P --> v01.08.01.00

- X1C --> v01.08.02.00
- X1E --> v01.01.02.00
- A1 --> v01.04.00.00
- A1 Mini -->v01.04.00.00

It is possible that Bambu Lab may release a future firmware version which impacts the functions available from the Panda Touch. Bigtreetech will monitor all beta firmware versions and if we find a firmware version that affects Panda Touch functionality we will send out an alert via email, BTT social channels. Buyers can then decide whether or not they would like to perform the update at the risk of losing functionality. Note that the Panda Touch warranty does not cover lost functionality due to a Bambu Lab firmware update being performed.

Click the link to view Panda Touch software instructions and more product information: https://bttwiki.com/PandaTouch.html

Key Features:

products.title: TD-1 Instant Filament TD (Transmissivity) Tester for HueForge by AJAX
products.body_html:
Quickly assess filament transmissivity and colour properties with the TD-1 Instant Filament TD Tester, purpose-built for HueForge users. Capture TD values and estimate hex colour codes directly from your material to streamline library management and material onboarding. Ideal for expanding your filament database with precision and efficiency.

Note: DIY/Assembled are EOL(While Stock Last), BIQU TD1S and DIY (no license) will be stock onwards. 

DIY/Assembled Kit Description

This is available in two configurations: DIY Kit (Build your Own) and Completely Assembled. Your purchase of this item from DREMC directly benefits the creator (AJAX). If you need printed part, contact us for a quote. 

Note: If you are not comfortable with 3d printing a case within tolerance or soldering or troubleshooting, we advise against the DIY kit, we recommend the ready to use assembled kit. 

Note: Colour of printed case may differ, its selected at random, if you have preference on colour, please contact before purchased we let you know which colour is available. 

Key Features:

  • Capture TD: Quickly measure the Transmission Distance of your filament.
  • Capture Hex Color Code: Obtain the color hex code of your filament.
  • Quick Capture Mode: Quickly add new filaments directly to your library.
  • Continuous Capture Mode: Monitor the real-time TD data of your filament, whether it’s actively in use or during the spooling process directly on the production line.
  • Seamless Integration: Connect directly with HueForge software to effortlessly add new filaments to your library.
  • 0.91″ OLED Display: View test results even when not connected to HueForge for manual entry later or for uses outside of HueForge.
  • USB-C Interface: Convenient USB-C interface with included cable (PCB kit and assembled versions).

Why Choose The TD-1:

The TD-1 is designed with simplicity and practicality in mind. Say goodbye to the hassle of printing step tests, as this device allows you to gather “close enough” data by simply inserting a strand of filament. The choice of continuous capture mode keeps you in control, monitoring TD values in real-time as the filament flows, ensuring you always have the data you need.

For the TD-1 DIY KIT you will need to build/assemble. For this you will need:

  • Solder and Soldering Iron
  • Double sided VHB tape
  • Eye protection
  • Flush cutters
  • 3D printed parts (see below for link)

TD-1 Instruction Guide 

3d Printed Case by AJAX 3D

DIY Kit (no license):

For the TD-1 DIY KIT (no License) you will need to build/assemble.

For this you will need:

  • The license is 10 USD (~17.5 AUD) additional via AJAX 3D Patreon
    • License Step Guide: https://ajax-3d.com/td-1pcb-kit-project-guide/
  • Solder and Soldering Iron
  • Double sided VHB tape
  • Eye protection
  • Flush cutters
  • 3D printed parts (see below for link)

The 2 Part PCB (Black) are sourced from BIQU, the remaining bom are sourced by DREMC, and will require soldering header onto sub component and printed parts. 

We donate a small portion of this DIY kit to AJAX

3d Printed Case by AJAX 3D

TD-1 Instruction Guide (Assembly Guide, for flashing software see above link)

BIQU TD1S Version: 

Note: TD-1 Black only available in a Black Shell. 

𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬

  • Accurately determine the Transmission Distance (TD) of any filament with precision. Instantly obtain the hex color code for exact digital applications. 
  • Seamlessly integrates with HueForge, delivering ±7.5% TD accuracy for authentic color rendering.
  • Powered via USB-C for broad compatibility. An OLED screen offers real-time data and standalone use, even without a HueForge connection.
  • Features Quick Capture Mode for rapid material profiling and Continuous Capture Mode to track filament TD live during printing or spooling.

products.title: Trianglelab TradRack 14 Channels MMU system Hardware Kit
products.body_html:

Developed collaboratively by Ryan G and Annex Engineering, this 14-channel hardware kit enables users to expand material capabilities without prohibitive investment, making advanced multi-material printing accessible to makers and professionals alike.

products.title: E3D Roto Extruder
products.body_html:
Roto is the extruder that Revo deserves. It carefully balances weight (140g) and force (70N+) to provide the lightest, most power-dense 3D printing extruder on the market.

Features:

  • Mass: 146
  • Extrusion force: 70N+
  • Filament Diameter: 1.75mm
  • Recommended motor current: 0.45A PEAK
  • Gear ratio: 11.262:1
  • Operational temp rating: 40°C

Lightweight yet full of force

The roto gearbox consists of a planetary initial stage followed by a spur secondary stage with a dual hobb third stage.  To put it concisely, this results in enough extrusion force to fully utilise our Revo High Flow nozzles' maximum volumetric flow rates while providing a favourable motor stall (rather than filament grind) failure mode.

Maintenance minded

Ease of use was a major consideration in the design of Roto. To access the hobbs all you need to do is remove three bolts to remove the heatsink and filament path whilst leaving the body of your extruder mounted in situ.

We have also revamped the filament tensioning system, providing a simple bi-stable mechanism that either provides the optimal tension or completely releases the tension to help with filament loading and cold pulls. This means you can change the nozzle and release the filament with one hand.

Cool Design

Roto features a first of its kind 3D printed metal heatsink. SLM 3D printing gave us unparalleled design freedom, which means beyond the obvious cool factor of using this technology, the design has been highly optimised. The heatsink prevents heat creep by reducing heat build-up via conduction and directs air through the air-break to disrupt the radiating heat from the HotSide, resulting in the most thermally effective heatsink we have ever produced.

Standard… or smart

Roto's evolution doesn't stop at the base performance characteristics you're used to. Upgrade to the sensored bundle to add filament monitoring, an action button, fan speed monitoring and heatsink temperature monitoring to your arsenal. With all these improvements, you can implement peace of mind within your workflow with remote monitoring and quick, simple maintenance for the most hands-off 3D printing experience ever.

Want more juicy details? Visit our blog for a further deep dive into what makes Revo Roto the most power dense extruder on the market. 

What is Included: 

Standard Roto:

  • 1 x Revo Motor with cable
  • 1 x 2 Wire Fan with cable
  • 1 x Fixings Kit
  • 1 x Roto cold-side assembly
  • 1 x Bowden tubing

Sensored Roto:

  • 1 x Revo Motor with cable
  • 1 x 3 wire fan with cable
  • 1 x Fixings kit
  • 1 x Roto coldside assembly
  • 1 x Bowden tubing

The entry level ‘Starter Pack’ is a fantastic choice for users who are just starting out in 3D printing or for those who typically print at standard speeds with polymers such as PLA, PETG and ASA. The natural upgrade is to our ‘High Flow Pack’, aimed at users who want to maximise their printer’s speed capabilities and/or print big. 

Filaments are coming to market faster than you can change a Revo nozzle, with abrasive materials such as carbon fibre and glass fibre becoming increasingly popular, this is where our ‘High Flow X Pack’ comes in. This kit equips you with everything you need to tackle abrasive polymers, with the combined benefit of high flow capabilities.

The Revo Hotside range wouldn’t be complete without experimental packs for you daring Makers out there. Our ‘Genius Packs’ give you the freedom to print with all filaments, including metal and ceramic, up to 400°C. Check them out here, if you dare

products.title: Micro Swiss FlowTech™ Hotend for Creality Ender 3 V3 SE
products.body_html:
Upgrade your Ender 3 V3 SE printer with the FlowTech hotend kit and enjoy the convenience of cold nozzle changes, leak-proof nozzles, and a significant increase in flow rate.

This kit comes with a plug and play Heater Core and thermistor, fully compatible with Ender 3 V3 SE printer without any need for firmware adjustments!

Additionally, to accommodate the extended length of the FlowTech nozzles, we provide a CR touch spacer along with a modified part cooling fan duct.

Made in USA by Micro Swiss

Features:

  • Leak-Proof Nozzle:
    Tired of messy nozzle leaks that ruin your prints and waste filament? FlowTech Hotend combines nozzle and thermal break into one permanently sealed assembly that ensures a leak-proof hotend.

  • Cold Nozzle Change:
    Swapping out nozzles used to be a time-consuming and potentially hazardous task. With a FlowTech Hotend, nozzle changes are effortless, and there's no need for hot tightening, and you can do it with just one hand.

  • High-Flow Characteristics:
    Ceramic cylindrical heater and 28.6mm melt zone provides excellent volumetric flow rate.

  • All-Metal Design:
    Built to last! FlowTech hotend features an all-metal design that can handle most modern 3D printing filaments. The entire hotend is machined and assembled in-house, with quality control performed at multiple stages during the manufacturing process. At the end, each hotend undergoes a full thermal cycling test before it is packaged.

  • 300°C Max Temperature:
    This hotend is rated at 300°C temperature with a properly tuned NTC thermistor for each specific printer. This particular edition is perfectly tuned for Ender 3 V3 KE so no firmware changes are needed.

Made in USA by Micro Swiss

Supported Device:

products.title: Fysetc Hardened Steel Extruder Gear Assembly for Bambu X1/P1
products.body_html:
The Fysetc Hardened Steel Extruder Gear Assembly delivers precision filament feeding for Bambu X1/P1 printers through advanced engineering. Its integrated shaft design minimises gear eccentricity and ensures uniform filament transport, while helical gear geometry optimises meshing performance and transmission smoothness. Manufactured from high-strength mold steel with nano-coating surface treatment, the assembly achieves Rockwell hardness of HRC 62-65 and surface hardness of HV 1000-1200, providing exceptional load capacity and extended operational durability for demanding 3D printing applications.

Features:

  • The integrated shaft design ensures better eccentricity of the gears, reduces eccentric rotation of the gears due to assembly, and ensures that the gears transport filament more evenly.
  • Helical gear design, better meshing performance, smoother gear transmission, and more linear transmission force. The transmission overlap is large, the meshing time is long, and the contact area is large, which reduces the stress, thereby improving the load-bearing capacity of the gear and extending the service life of the gear.
  • Use high-strength mold steel as the material of the feeding gear, and use nano-coating for surface treatment. The overall Rockwell hardness HRC value of the gear reaches 62-65; the surface hardness HV 1000-1200. 

What is Included:

  • 1x Fysetc Hardened Steel Extruder Gear Assembly (Latest V1.1)

Compatibility:

  • For Bambu Lab X1 series, Bambu Lab P1P and P1S,

products.title: Polymaker Fiberon PA612-CF15 Nylon 500g 1.75mm (aka PolyMide)
products.body_html:
Industrial carbon-fiber reinforced Nylon 612 combines the mechanical performance and low-cost of Nylon 6 with the low moisture sensitivity of Nylon 12.

  • Carbon-fiber reinforced Nylon 6 and Nylon 12-blend combines better mechanical performance than PA12 with lower moisture sensitivity than PA6.
  • Reinforced with 15% chopped fibers delivering excellent stiffness and high strength to weight ratio.
  • The best strength and stiffness among Polymaker Nylon products in "wet state".
  • High heat resistance up to 175°C HDT (0.45 MPa) after annealing.
  • Excellent dimensional stability during printing.
  • Cardboard spool & packaging (made from 100% recycled cardboard)


PolyMide PA612-CF has transitioned to Polymakers Fiberon range and is now sold as Fiberon PA612-CF15 (same product, new name and packaging)

Fiberon™ is polymakers family of fiber-reinforced composite filaments developed to provide outstanding mechanical performance for a range of engineering applications.

Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 is a carbon fiber reinforced nylon filament based on a copolymer of Nylon 6 and Nylon 12. Featuring 15% chopped carbon fibers by weight, this filament has lower moisture sensitivity compared to PA6/66 and PA6-based materials, and better mechanical properties than PA12-based materials. Together with Polymaker's Warp-Free™ and Fiber-Adhesion™ technology, Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 offers an optimal balance by combining the advantages of both PA6 and PA12 with optimized fiber reinforcement to deliver a high-performance filament with outstanding potential for industrial engineering, tooling, automotive, and end-use applications.

Why choose PA612-CF15


  • Best of PA6 and PA12 - Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 is a copolymer combining PA6 and PA12 with 15% chopper carbon fiber to deliver high stiffness, tensile strength and heat resistance with lower moisture sensitivity. Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 offers the best middle ground between PA6 and PA12 and is a great-all-rounder for real-world applications that require the higher mechanical performance and affordability of short-chain nylon (PA6) with the reduced moisture sensitivity of long-chain nylon (PA12).
  • Reduced Moisture Sensitivity - In most applications nylon parts absorb moisture from the air. The water molecule increases toughness and durability of the nylon while reducing strength and stiffness. PA6 is more susceptible to absorbing moisture than PA12 and as a result the mechanical properties of PA6 are effected in some application environments. Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 is less hygroscopic than PA6-CF making it an ideal and cost-effective alternative to Fiberon™ PA6-CF20 for parts which may be subject to high humidity. 
  • Excellent Heat Resistance - Featuring a high heat resistance after annealing[1], Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 offers excellent heat resistance for demanding applications where heat and stress are critical design factors.
  • Outstanding Layer Adhesion - Most fiber reinforced materials show a decrease in z-axis layer adhesion when compared with their non-fiber reinforced Nylons, producing a part that is only stronger on the X-Y axis but detrimental to the Z axis. Polymakers Fiber Adhesion™ technology improves the layer adhesion of fiber reinforced materials, by optimizing the surface chemistry of the fibers to achieve better dispersion and bonding to the matrix. The implementation of this technology in Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 not only solves this problem but actually increases Z axis tensile strength creating more isotropic parts that are strong in every direction.
  • Warp-Free™ - Warp-Free™ technology enables the production of Nylon-based filaments that can be 3D printed with excellent dimensional stability and near-zero warpage. This is achieved by the fine control of microstructure and crystallization behaviour of Nylon, which enables the material to fully release the internal stress before solidification. The Warp-Free™ technology in Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 is designed to work best with minimal bed temperatures.
  • Excellent Printability – Unlike many other brands of Nylon filament, Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 is extremely easy to work with, exhibiting excellent dimensional stability during printing. It is compatible with most filament-based 3D printers capable of reaching 260°C nozzle temperature and no heated bed or chamber is required!
  • Uncompromised Quality - Polymakers leading quality control process and rigorous in-house testing ensure reliable printing and consistency across spools and batches.
 

[1] Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 displays the best mechanical and thermal properties when fully crystallized. The printed part will not reach full crystallization during the printing process, an additional step is required: Annealing. Fiberon™ PA612-CF15 can be annealed in the oven at 100˚C for 16 hours right after the printing process.

products.title: PT100 Daughterboard V1.1a
products.body_html:
This is a daughterboard specifically designed for the Duet range of controller boards that supports one or two PT100 temperature sensors in either two or four wire configuration. There are jumpers on the latest version of the board for easily switching between two and four wire mode.

The PT100 Daughter Board is compatible with all Duet 2 and 3 mainboards, along with the Expansion 3HC.

The Duet 3 and Duet 2 mainboards support up to two daughterboards, with a further daughterboards on Duet 3 3HC expansion boards or the on a Duex5 expansion board for Duet 2. With 4 daughter boards a total of 8 PT100 sensors are supported. PT100 and Thermocouple daughterboards can be mixed and matched.

products.title: Millennium Machines Milo V1.5 Kit by LDO
products.body_html:
After a year of R&D we are finally able to offer this amazing LDO kits for the millennium machines Milo V1.5. 

EOL: LDO/Milo is expected to release new revision that's coming soon (Expected Q2 2026), once those kit are available this listing "See Suggested Alternative Product" will be linked to new V2.0 Kit. This product listing will be remain as a reference. 

Does not include Printed Parts
Note: Include Spindle + Inverter (220v)
In Stock Batch 8
 

Based on the OpenBuilds MiniMill, the Millennium Machines Milo is an open-source project for DIYers to create a reliable, low cost and powerful desktop CNC mill on their own terms. The mill is designed to have the ability to cut aluminum but is also capable of cutting a vast range of softer materials such as composites, woods and plastics.

Whats included:

A detailed BOM list will be included soon, this kit comes with everything needed to build the Milo V1.5 including mods like FMJ for rigidity and a pre tapped Fixture bed. the only parts missing are Printed parts

Bom: https://docs.ldomotors.com/en/milo/milov15/BOM

What you need to source or need:

  • Printed parts
  • Vice or work holding equipment.
  • Preferable dedicated outlet/circuit for spindle and inverter 

Kit contents:

  • 120mm clearance Milo V1.5 parts (Including spindle & VFD)
  • 120mm Aluminium FMJ plates
  • Aluminium XY plate
  • Aluminium Z plate
  • End mill starter set
  • 123 Blocks
  • Dial indicator
  • Safety specs

Useful Links:

  • Millennium Machines Github
  • Printed Parts Guide
  • Wiring Guide 
  • Youtube Product Video
  • Unboxing Video

 

Milo dimension:
  • Storage: X: 735 mm Y: 670 mm Z: 670 mm
  • In motion X: 1,155 mm Y: 670 mm Z: 670 mm (not including any cable loops that extend beyond the rigid parts)

 

Features & Extras

  • Full Metal Jacket (FMJ) Mod - This mod adds two CNC machined aluminium plates which increases the rigidity of main column.
  • F.I.X.A.T.E.D - Our kit includes the a fixture plate from the FIXATED mod that covers the entire work surface. The version included is the Continental Breakfast.
  • Long John Toolsetter - Our kit includes a modified version of the Long John Toolsetter mod. The mod allows for easy tool height setting.
  • Brass Heatset Insert Tool - We've included custom machined brass tips for your soldering iron, use it to install heatset inserts with ease! Check here for more information.
  • Pre-cut & Pre-wired - Our kit includes all necessary wiring: cut to the right length and pre-crimped or soldered to their respective parts. See our detailed wiring guide here.
  • Small Tools - We include a set of tools for all the fasteners used in the build (Preparing your own set of good quality hex wrenches is still recommended). Also included are wrenches for the spindles.

Tips

  • Take advantage of the community on Discord. If you run into any general issues, help can be found on the #milo-v_1_5channel.
  • Get a serial number once you finish building your Milo.

Guides

  • Printed Parts Guide (LDO supplement) - Are you planning on printing parts before the kit arrives? Read our supplementary print guide to see which parts to print/replace/omit.
  • Wiring Guide - We created this supplementary wiring guide to go along with the included cable kit. We recommend reading the guide ahead of time: Some cable routing is required while you assemble the mechanical components.

Acknowledgements

LDO would like to give our sincere thanks to the Millenium Machines team, beta testers, and members of the community for helping us constantly improve our kits:

  • Beta Kit Testers (V2.4-300): Jake, DaveFrom3DPandMe, Tinman, Camerony.

products.title: Vz-Hextrudort-Low Extruder by Mellow3D
products.body_html:
Precision-engineered all-metal extruder assembly by Mellow3D, designed for VzBoT systems. The hardened steel gear (55 HRC) features CNC-machined reduction gears with integrated shaft design for consistent filament feed and extrusion accuracy. Paired with a lightweight 6061 aluminium alloy shell, this extruder delivers superior thermal management and durability compared to plastic alternatives. Tighter tolerances and hollowed construction minimise deformation whilst maintaining strength, resulting in enhanced printing stability and extended motor lifespan.

Features: 

  • The extruder gear is crafted from hardened steel (55 HRC) for durability during extended printing. Its integrated shaft design and precision CNC-machined reduction gears ensure stable filament feed and accurate extrusion.
  • This gear features tighter tolerances and less deformation than injection-molded gears, enhancing extruder precision and stability. Its hollowed design reduces weight without losing strength.
  • The extruder shell, designed by VzBoT, is made from high-precision CNC-machined 6061 aluminum alloy. This lightweight metal offers greater strength and accuracy than plastic, protecting internal parts and extending machine life. Its excellent thermal conductivity helps dissipate motor heat, ensuring stable printing and longer motor durability.

Credit:

Vz Extruder — Designed with VzBoT Team Expertise made by Mellow3D based on MirageC HextrudORT 

What is Included:

Set 2 (VZ Plus Extruder) no Motor

  • 1x Vz Extruder (Silver)

  • Notice: In the jam detection configuration, detection_length: 2.0
  • 2.0mm is the minimum detection length required for the intelligent consumable detection module to work properly. If you encounter a false triggering problem, try increasing the detection length by 1 mm until the problem is resolved.

Motor Options:

This extruder offers customisable options with reduction ratios of 8:60 or 10:60, pulse settings suited for 8-tooth or 10-tooth motors, and supports motor currents between 0.6A and 1A. You can choose between 8T or 10T Moons and LDO motors to fit your needs.

products.title: Vz-Hextrudort-Low Plus Extruder 60T 12MM Gear by Mellow3D
products.body_html:
The Vz Plus Extruder 60T 12MM Gear delivers precision extrusion through hardened steel (55 HRC) construction and CNC machining. Its hollowed-out design reduces weight without compromising durability, whilst the 6061 aluminium shell dissipates heat more effectively than plastic alternatives. The innovative twirl gear geometry increases friction and minimises wear, making it ideal for flexible materials like TPU. At 11 grams heavier than the original Vz model, it offers enhanced control and reliability. Includes integrated Bowden connector for secure PETF tube attachment and straightforward installation.

Features: 

  • This all-metal gear, crafted from hardened steel (55 HRC) with precise CNC machining, offers reliable durability and accurate extrusion for extended 3D printing.
  • The hollowed-out extruder body and gear design reduces weight while maintaining strong, reliable performance.
  • The CNC machined 6061 aluminum shell is lightweight, strong, and better than plastic shells at dissipating heat. 
  • The new twirl gear design boosts friction and reduces wear, improving overall performance.
  • Larger gears specifically designed for printing flexible materials like TPU, improving control; weighs 11 grams more than the original Vz model; includes a Bowden connector for easy fixation of PETF tubes, enhancing flexibility and ease of use.

products.title: NiteHawk SB Toolhead by LDO
products.body_html:
Nite hawk is a toolhead PCB with a RP2040 MCU, TMC2209, Accelerometer all integrated into one board. The form factor is based on HartK’s two-piece stealth burner toolhead PCB but with some minor changes.

Features

  • Greatly simplified wiring, a single wire runs through the drag chain or in an umbilical setup. No additional breakout cables needed.
  • Based on Klipper USB, no additional hardware or software setup compared to CAN.
  • Tachometer enabled fan ports (PCF and HEF), allowing for fan speed detection.
  • Integrated accelerometer for convenient input-shaping.

Documentation: 

Github: https://github.com/MotorDynamicsLab/Nitehawk-SB

LDO Doc: https://docs.ldomotors.com/en/Toolboard/nitehawk-sb

Fan Voltage: https://docs.ldomotors.com/en/Toolboard/nitehawk-sb#pinout-fan-adapter-pcb (Requires soldering and cut tracing if you wish to switch to 5V hotend/part cooling fans, see above link for more information]

FAQ

Q. I have an LDO V2.4/Trident Kit, the fan adapter PCB provided looks identical to the one in the kit are they interchangeable?

A. Yes! The fan adapter PCB is 100% the same as the one in the current LDO kits.

Q. Can I use the provided cable in a drag chain or umbilical setup?

A. Yes! The included toolhead cable is drag chain rated but also easily set up for umbilical use.

Q. I see that there is a 4pin XY endstop connector, what is that for?

A. Since there is no longer any breakout PCB, the XY endstop can instead be routed a short distance through the X drag chain and into the toolboard. Of course, you can also opt to route directly back to the mainboard or just use sensorless homing.

Q. What is the ACT LED for? 

A. That’s just a controllable LED, you can find it in the klipper config we provide. It doesn’t do anything else otherwise.

products.title: Camera Assisted XY Calibration Tool by Ember Prototypes
products.body_html:
Ember’s Camera-Assisted XY Calibration Tool (CXC) is a compact device designed to streamline XY offset calibration on dual extruder, IDEX, and tool-changing 3D printers without requiring printed line patterns.

Traditionally, calibration was a slow, error-prone task, but the CXC automates this with a camera-based system, reducing human error. Engineered for simplicity and wide compatibility, it can be mounted on virtually any printer, completing calibration in under five minutes.

 

Its can be automated using :  Klipper Tool Alignment (using) Machine Vision. 

Designed and assembled in Vancouver.

Requirements

  • Windows operating system

  • Ability to jog the gantry in steps of 0.1mm or less and read the absolute position

  • Ability to override XY calibration values (or tune offsets in the slicer)

Documentation & Software

User Manual

products.title: Bigtreetech Kraken - High Current Stepper 8 Axis Motherboard
products.body_html:
The BIGTREETECH Kraken V1.0 is a sophisticated 32-bit motherboard engineered by Shenzhen Biqu Technology's specialist 3D printing division for large-format printer applications. Its integrated high-current stepper motor driver architecture eliminates the need for external high-voltage driver modules, reducing wiring complexity and chassis footprint. The board combines compact layout efficiency with premium finishing, including precision silk-screen labelling and purpose-designed heat sinks for thermal management. This integration of electrical performance and thoughtful industrial design delivers a streamlined control solution for demanding multi-axis printer builds.

Key Features:

  • Effortless Motor Control. Equipped with 8*TMC2160 drivers, supporting a broad voltage range of 24V-60V, eliminating the need for driver installation and ensuring seamless compatibility.

  • Dual Print Head Efficiency. Utilizing the high-performance H723 chip, the motherboard enables dual print heads to operate simultaneously, facilitated by dedicated ports specifically designed to support their seamless functioning, thereby maximizing overall printing efficiency without compromising quality.

  • Versatile Connectivity Options. Featuring a reserved power supply interface for added convenience, it seamlessly integrates with external Single Board Computers (SBC) like BTT PI, as well as Raspberry Pi, providing enhanced flexibility and control.

  • Support Precision Temperature Control. Supports two channels of MAX31865 and two channels of PT100/PT1000 resistors, ensuring precise temperature control for optimal printing conditions.

  • Expanded Interface Capability. Incorporates two CAN interfaces, allowing for the concurrent connection of dual print heads to EBB (Extruder Breakout Board), enhancing versatility in 3D printing configurations.

  • Robust Motherboard Protection. Implements enhanced protection with an e-fuse circuit, fortifying the motherboard against potential risks and ensuring sustained reliability during extended usage.

Specification:

MCU

ARM Cortex-M7 STM32H723ZGT6 550MHz

Expansion Interfaces

Probe(Servos, Probe), Servo, Filament Sensor, PS-ON, I²C. RGBx2, SPI, SBC (UART), EXP1+EXP2, CANx2, PT100/PT1000x2, USB-A 5V Power, Endstop Portx8,etc.

Driver Input Voltage

HV (24-60V)

Motor Drivers

Onboard TMC2160, support 24-60V, Max 8A driving current for M1-M4, Max 3A for M5-M8

Motherboard Input Voltage

DCIN= DC12V or DC24V

Driver Modes

SPI

Heated Bed Input Voltage

BED IN= DC12V or DC24V

Motor Interfaces

M1, M2, M3, M4, M5, M6, M7, M8

Logic Voltage

DC3.3V

Temp Sensor Interfaces

5x 100K NTC, 2x MAX31865

Heating Interface

Heated Bed (HB), Heater Cartridge

(HE0, HE1, HE2, HEЗ)

Display

LCD

Max Heated Bed Output Current

10A, peak 11A

PC Communication

Type-C

Max Heater Cartridge Output Current

6A, peak 6.5A

Supported Kinematics

Cartesian, Delta, Kossel, Ultimaker, CoreXY

Fan Interfaces

6x 2-pin CNC Fans (FANO, FAN1, FAN2, FAN3, FAN4, FAN5) 2x 4-pin CNC Fans (FAN6, FAN7), 5x Always-On Fan, CNC Fans Voltage (5V, 12V, 24V) Selectable

Recommended Slicer/Console

Cura, Simplify3D, Pronterface, Repetier-host, Makerware

Max Fan Output Current

1A, peak 1.5A

Firmware Support

Klipper, Marlin, RRF

Total Current for Heater Cartridge + Fans

Less than 14A

Dimensions

200 x 113mm

Motherboard Max 5V Output Current

5A (peak 6A)

Mounting Dimensions

193 x 106mm

Motherboard Max 12V Output Current

5A (peak 6A)

Compatibility

Voron PHOENIX,Voron 2.4,Voron Trident,Vzbot,etc.

Documentation：

https://github.com/bigtreetech/BIGTREETECH-Kraken

products.title: Duet 3 Scanning Z Probe
products.body_html:
The Duet 3 Scanning Z probe allows for quick inductive scans of metallic bed surfaces to build a point mesh of the surface to be used for mesh bed compensation.

The Duet 3 Scanning Z probe is a CAN-FD connected inductive sensing board, with compatible inductive PCB coils. It allows for a point mesh of the bed to be built up quickly as no movement in Z is required to read the bed distance, and individual readings happen very quickly. An accelerometer has been added to the PCB as well to allow for the SZP board to also be used for input shaping calibration.

Integrating and mounting a Duet 3 Scanning Z Probe is easy as we deliberately separated the processing board from the coil that is used as a sensor using a Flat Flexible Cable. That allows for freedom of mounting of the sensing board, as only the coil needs to be next to the nozzle and close to the bed.

We will supply both 15mm and 12mm coils with initial orders. As we characterise performance we will settle on one "standard" coil diameter and may supply other diameters separately.

Documentation: 

GO TO DOCUMENTATION>

 

FEATURES
Processor ATSAMC21G18A
Processor features 32-bit, 48MHz ARM Cortex M0+, 256KB Flash, 32KB RAM
Networking/Comms CAN-FD interconnect to Duet 3 Tool Distribution Board or Duet 3 Mainboard; serial port
Scanning IC LDC1612
Accelerometer LIS2DW12
Power monitoring VIN voltage reporting
Input power voltage 5V
Power consumption <200mA

products.title: LDO Smart Orbiter V3.0 SO3 V6 / Revo Edition
products.body_html:
The LDO Smart Orbiter 3.0 is a lightweight, high-precision dual-drive extruder. It builds on the proven Orbiter v2 design, integrating it into a compact, all-in-one planetary direct drive system.

A design by Dr. Lorincz Rober in cooperation with LDO. For more information visit https://orbiterprojects.com/.

Note: Depending on your selection, there is V6 hotend option or E3D Revo option.

Features of Smart Orbiter:

  • Unique tensioning mechanism with predefined tensioning levels.
  • Short 17.7mm filament path between gear and hotend.
  • Suitable for large range of materials such as flexible like TPU.
  • Frameless recessed fan to reduce extruder dimension and weight
  • Fixed 2 level pre defined filament tension (regular filament and tighter for TPU), ensure consistent extrusion between maintenance.
  • Large RNC coated dual drive gears with planetary gear reduction similar to Orbiter v2.0
  • Precision main shaft for lowest possible drive gear eccentricity
  • Full aluminum housing and plastic gears for low noise
  • Integrated electronics (Filament sensing and auto load, internal temperature sensor, LEG light for filament status, optimised for klipper.
  • Easy remove system for the secondary drive gear for easy cleaning
    and maintenance
  • Include Bondtech V6 Bondtech CHT Nozzle or Revo Nozzle depending on your selection. 

Cad: https://orbiterprojects.com//download/SO3/SmartOrbiterMockup.zip

Mounts: https://www.orbiterprojects.com/SO3/

products.title: E3D Revo™ Diamondback Nozzle
products.body_html:
The ultimate nozzle innovation available today. This partnership with DiamondBack introduces Polycrystalline Diamond (PCD) technology into your 3D printing Revo setup.
 
Pre-Order -  Lead time 1.5-2.5 weeks

Diamond tipped, NOT Diamond coated  

Why Diamond?  

The rapid development of fibre, metal and ceramic filaments has increased the need for abrasion-resistant nozzles. Compared with all the nozzle options on the market, DiamondBack’s diamonds deliver unmatched wear-resistance and versatility. 

These diamonds are composed of multiple tiny diamond crystals with a proprietary binder that forms a matrix of crystals joined with diamond-to-diamond bonds. They retain a good portion of the diamond hardness whilst reducing the inherent brittleness of a single-crystal diamond, making them a fantastic choice for printing abrasive filaments. 

Longer life  

The PCD used in every DiamondBack nozzle will significantly extend the overall life of the nozzle. The extreme hardness, wear resistance, and thermal conductivity of this unique material make it an ideal solution for 3D printing. Delivers high thermal conductivity, low coefficient of friction, and high fracture toughness.  

Experiment freely  

DiamondBack nozzle carriers are machined from Brass, providing a straight swap experience with your other Revo nozzles. The diamond tip is inserted to provide abrasion resistance where it’s needed: at the tip orifice, and the tip flat. 

With nozzle swapping this easy, you’re free to experiment with nozzle sizes you might not have used before. Set your 3D printer up for ultra-fine or ultra-thick extrusion widths in no time at all. Print large objects in less time or tiny objects with high resolution.  

Frustration-free  

Each Revo Nozzle is a preassembled nozzle and HeatBreak in one unit, so there’s no hazardous hot tightening and no chance of incorrect assembly. Say goodbye to frustrating HotEnd leaks and enjoy reliable 3D printing!  

Rapid identification  

Identify nozzle sizes at a glance, thanks to a colour-coded silicone sock. Plus, each Revo Nozzle has its size engraved into it with easy-to-read numbers, so there are no confusing identification markers to learn. 

Read our Revo DiamondBack Nozzle blog  here .

products.title: Bi Metallic MY Nozzle for Elegoo Neptune 4 / 4 Pro by Trianglelab
products.body_html:
The Trianglelab Bi-Metallic MY Nozzle is engineered for the Elegoo Neptune 4 and 4 Pro, offering superior thermal conductivity and enhanced durability. Its bi-metal design combines excellent heat transfer with resistance to wear, ensuring consistent extrusion and high-quality prints.

Nozzle Size available:

  • 0.4mm/1.75mm
  • 0.6mm/1.75mm

Compatible:

  • Elegoo Neptune 4 / 4 Pro

What's included:

  • 1x Hardened Steel Tipped Nozzle for Elegoo Neptune 4 / 4 Pro Compatible

Recommend Max Torque: 1.5nm hot tightened torque 

Do Note: Hardened steel steel tip nozzle with copper main body does usually does not require temperature change 

Filled filament such as sparkle/cf/gf we recommended 0.6mm+ nozzle. 

Why Choose Hardened Steel & Copper?

  • Opting for hardened steel and copper components offers a valuable advantage. Copper-plated nozzles prove to be an economical solution for extending the filament compatibility of your 3D printer, particularly when working with high-temperature filaments. These nozzles serve as direct replacements in the aftermarket, offering an exceptional balance between cost and quality in the market.
  • Crafted to withstand extreme temperatures, this nozzle demonstrates remarkable durability, capable of handling temperatures up to 450°C. The copper alloy with high-temperature resistance facilitates effective heat conduction and retention, setting it apart from most conventional nozzles. Additionally, the nickel plating plays a role in minimizing filament adhesion to the nozzle.
  • Incorporating a hardened steel tip insert, this nozzle is specifically designed for use with abrasive filaments, ensuring longevity that goes beyond the lifespan of the printer itself. This all-in-one solution encompasses the ideal combination of materials to deliver exceptional performance.
