products.title: LDO Leviathan V1.3 3D Printer Control Board
products.body_html:
The LDO Leviathan V1.3 is a comprehensive control board built on STM32F446 architecture with native Klipper firmware support. It features dual power supplies (24V main, 24-48V for TMC5160 drivers), five TMC2209 and two TMC5160 stepper drivers for advanced motion control, four independent thermistor inputs, four PWM fan outputs with tachometer support, and dedicated heater outputs for hotend (180W) and heatbed (240W) applications. Additional capabilities include probe and filament sensor inputs, addressable RGB lighting control, three endstop inputs, and an expansion port offering ADC, UART, SPI/CAN connectivity with auxiliary power rails, ideal for complex multi-axis printer configurations and advanced sensor integration.

Note: Order after 28/07/2025 are shipping newer V1.3 version. 

Documentation: 

  • Github: https://github.com/MotorDynamicsLab/Leviathan
  • Guide for 1.3: https://ldomotion.com/guides/voron-leviathan-v1-3
  • Guide for 1.2: https://ldomotion.com/guides/voron-leviathan-v12

Resources: Manual Download Link

Features (V1.3): (Changes)

  • STM32H743 MCU (25 MHz crystal)

Features (V1.2): 

  • Supports Klipper firmware
  • STM32F446 MCU
  • 1x Vin 24V Mainsupply (polarity and overvoltage protected)
  • 1x Vin 24-48V TMC5160 supply (polarity and overvoltage protected)

products.title: Trianglelab Dragon Ace™ Hotend (PT1000) Black
products.body_html:
Dragon Ace™ is a new generation of general-purpose, high-flow hotend from Triangle-Lab® that inherits the outstanding performance and compatibility of the Original Dragon hotend.

For maximum flowrate the Dragon Ace™ utilises Original Dragon's HF heat breaker design along with a volcano style heater block. The Dragon Ace™, even though the heating block becomes longer, it still weighs 10 grams less than the Original Dragon with the heating element included.

Nozzle Compatibility: V6 Nozzle (V6 style with 7.5MM Thread length) (As its use MZE Extender, its an be used with or without extender, depending on toolhead mount) 

Features: 

  • Although the overall length of Ace is shorter than the Original , with the included spacer it still fits onto the tool head originally designed for the Original Dragon. ⑤
    Dragon Ace™ provides adapters to fit the V6 Groove Mount, which can be mounted anywhere a V6 volcano hotend was originally designed to be mounted.
  • The heating section of Dragon Ace™ is 8.5MM longer than that of Original Dragon. There may be a mismatch in the height of the part cooling fan outlet and probe.

products.title: Genuine E3D Prusa Nextruder Nozzles for MK4/XL/Core One
products.body_html:
These authentic E3D Prusa nozzles are specifically designed for the Nextruder extruder, compatible with MK4, XL, and Core One 3D printers. Featuring an all-metal filament guide, they maintain a fully metal filament path, improving reliability and enabling quicker nozzle changes.

  • Simplified nozzle changing. Changing a nozzle on your Prusa printer just got much easier! Waste less time changing your nozzles and more time experimenting with different sizes and materials. 
  • Easy identification. Each Nozzle has its size engraved into it.
  • ObXiDian® 500 at least five times more wear resistant than ObXidian®

Compatibility:

  • Prusa MK3.9/S
  • Prusa MK4
  • Prusa MK4S
  • Prusa XL
  • Prusa Core One

 Specification:

  • Input diameter: 1.75mm
  • Maximum temperature: 300°C / 500°C for ObXidian 500
  • Compatible with: Prusa MK4 and XL
  • Material: Brass or Abrasion resistance ObXidian or ObXidian 500

Documentation:

  • Nozzle Changing Guide
  • E3D Prusa Nozzle Datasheet

Additional Note:

  • ObXidian™ coated nozzles are exceptionally wear resistant compared to other products on the market and significantly outperform other hardened nozzles. Improvements in ‘exotic’ engineering filaments mean that some new materials which include aggressive fillers, including but not limited to Polymaker’s Fiberon range (PA612-CF, PA6-CF, PA6-GF and PA12-CF), can cause significant wear on even ObXidian nozzles. E3D is actively developing even more specialist solutions for these materials. In the meantime please be aware that even the rainbows and unicorns in your ObXidian nozzle are not everlasting under extreme material conditions.
  • Some filled materials contain particles that are close to, if not larger than, some of the smaller industry standard nozzle sizes, including up to 0.4mm. Attempting to print such materials through these nozzle sizes significantly increases the risk a jam. Please check your filament manufacturer’s datasheet for recommended minimum nozzle orifice diameter to ensure that the nozzle/hotend you choose is suitable for your use case.

products.title: Bigtreetech TMC5160T Plus Stepper Motor Driver
products.body_html:
TMC5160T Plus is a high-power stepper motor driver control module, featuring 8 high-power MOSFETs separately mounted on the board with a maximum voltage of 60V. This supports a wider range of stepper motors and offers greater adaptability.

More info can be found here: 5160T Plus

User Manual: https://github.com/bigtreetech/BIGTREETECH-Stepper-Motor-Driver/blob/master/TMC5160T%20Plus/BIGTREETECH%20TMC5160T%20Plus%20User%20Manual.pdf

Features:

  • 8 high-power MOSFETs separately mounted on the board with 100V voltage
    resistance, 93A current resistance, and equivalent resistance as low as 6mΩ,
    significantly enhancing the drive's performance
  • Supports a maximum voltage of 60V, a maximum effective current (IRMS) of
    10.6A, and a sine wave peak current of up to 15A
  • Heat sink pre-designed with fan mounting holes for DIY fan installation
  • Pay attention to the power sequence; ensure the driver power is turned on before the logic power. That is, turn on the driver power first, then power on the motherboard. (ie You need setup homing macro to enable the driver and wait before sending move command).
  • Regardless of whether the driver uses high or low voltage power delivery, the output voltage from the main control board to the drive must not exceed 24V; exceeding this will damage the driver.

Size: TMC5160T Plus(W/o case): 58 x 50 x 28mm / TMC5160T Plus: 64 x 56 x 32.55mm

products.body_html:

Increase the Max Volumetric Flow of your Spider hotend by 25-65%
They are manufactured by Bondtech in-house,

ALERT : Avoid Cold Bondtech CHT Nozzles Change

Heat up the heat block up to 280C, or at least above 250C, before removing or tightening any Bondtech CHT nozzle. Use at most 1.5 Nm torque.


Bondtech CHT Spider Coated Brass Nozzle Features

    • 1 unit per pack;
    • Available sizes : 0.40, 0.60, 0.80, and 1.0mm;

    • Compatible with 2.85mm filament.
    • Requires 6mm wrench

What 3D printers can use the CHT Spider nozzle

When using Spider hotends, it may be used on the following Creality models:

  • Ender-2 Pro / Ender-2
  • Ender-3 Pro / Ender-3 / Ender-3 V2 / Ender-3S / Ender-3 Max
  • Ender-4
  • Ender-5 / Ender-5 Pro / Ender-5 Plus
  • Ender-6
  • Ender-7
  • CR-10 / CR-10S / CR-10 S4 / CR-10 S5 / CR-10 Mini / CR-10 V3
  • CR-20 / CR-20 Pro

Bondtech CHT Spider Coated Brass Nozzle Advantages

  • Higher melt capacity by increasing the surface area of the heating walls
  • Flow Rate gains between 25 and 65% (material and settings dependent)
  • Competitive price/performance price
  • Machined with ultra-precision
  • Brass nozzle with Nickel coated surface
  • Follows nozzle standard:
    • Spider (M6×1×9×16.8)
  • May be used with 1.75 or 2.85mm hotends.

Flow Rate gains may vary. Results depend on the hardware, materials and print settings used.

products.title: Cookiecad PLA Silk Gradient Filament 1.75mm 1kg
products.body_html:
High quality Silk PLA and unique gradient Silk PLA filament from Cookiecad. Silk PLA is super shiny and easy to print with but your prints will be more fragile than classic PLA; that's just the nature of silks. Not recommended for structural parts or cookie cutters. This roll is so much fun to print with! '

 

Note: The color will change slowly over time, so small objects will only contain one color. You can print multiple items at a time, large items or increase infill to get more of the color change into a single print.

 

This is Cookiecad Dual Unicorn Silk. It's silk pink on one side and silk blue on the other and prints both at the same time creating a unique color changing effect!

This is Silk Pink Ombré - it has two different shades of pink on one spool! The color will change slowly over time, so small objects will only contain one color.

This is Silk Unicorn- it has three magical colors on one spool! The color will change slowly over time, so small objects will only contain one color.

 

Empty Plastic Spool ~177g

 

Printing Settings

For best results, dry filament using a filament drier before use. Keep in an airtight container for medium/long term storage with silica desiccant. [If you hear popping or inconsistent extrusion while purging filament, suggest drying before printing for best results] Filament Drying Guide

Nozzle Temperature 190°C - 235°C
Build Plate Temperature 50°C - 60°C*
Build Surface Material Works well with most common build surfaces.
Build Surface Treatment Typically none required. Some surfaces such as glass work best with PVA glue stick or Magigoo .
Cooling Fan ON
Printing Speed 20 mm/s - 40 mm/s
Retraction The ideal retraction settings vary from printer to printer. If you find the retraction settings are causing gaps in your part, the following settings may help.
Direct Drive: Retraction distance of 0.5 - 1mm with retraction speed of 20mm/s
Bowden: Retraction distance of 2 - 3mm with retraction speed of 20 - 40mm/s
Drying Recommendation ~50°c for 4-6hrs (Only dry if filament is wet, over drying/repeat drying can damage filament) (Filament Dryer Guide)
Storage Keeping filament in an airtight container with new/dried desiccant.

Based on 0.4 mm nozzle. Printing conditions may vary with different printers and nozzle diameters.

products.title: Bigtreetech Manta M8P v2.0 Control Board Klipper
products.body_html:
CB1 Core Pad can be purchased separately here: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/bigtreetech-cb1-alternative-to-raspberry-pi-cm4 or CM4 Raspberry Pi Compute Unit.

  • Uses a 32 bit STM32H723ZET6 ARM Cortex M7 MCU running at 550MHz.
  • The TPS5450 5A power chip supports 12/24V DC input and delivers up to
  • 5A/6A peak for powering a Raspberry Pi.
  • A BOOT button is provided for DFU firmware updates.
  • The thermistor circuit is protected to prevent MCU damage from shorted
  • heated bed and heater cartridge connections.
  • PWM fans support 24/12/5V voltage selection without external transformer
  • module, reducing failure points.
  • The thermistor resistor can select the pull up resistor value through a
  • jumper to support PT1000 without an external module, which is convenient
  • for customers to use for DIY purposes.
  • The MCU firmware can be upgraded through an SD card or through the
  • "make flash" command in Klipper to update the MCU firmware via
  • The BTB connector allows use of CM4, CB1, or other core boards.
  • The onboard TMC driver works in SPI and UART modes, and the onboard
  • DIAG function pin can be used by simply plugging in a jumper.
  • Connectors for filament sensor, auto power off, BLTouch, RGB, I2C, servo,
  • 5V power detection, etc.
  • High performance MOSFETs reduce heating.
  • Replaceable fuses for easy service.
  • 3x 4 pin fan headers usable for water cooling.
  • Proximity switch header supports NPN and PNP (24/12/5V).
  • SPI expansion for accelerometer based resonance compensation.

Documentation: 

    Github M8P: https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-M8P

products.title: Trianglelabs Kevlar Wheel Bearing Pulley Kit OD 24mm

products.title: LDO Galileo 2 G2Z for Voron V2.4 / Micron Plus
products.body_html:
The LDO Galileo 2 G2Z represents a refined approach to Z-axis actuation for Voron V2.4 and Micron platforms. Its integrated 9:1 planetary gearbox and stepper motor eliminate conventional belt and pulley complexity, maximising internal electronics area while enhancing vertical resolution through increased mechanical advantage. The streamlined architecture proves particularly advantageous in space-constrained builds, though its modular design permits adaptation across alternative printer configurations.

If you have larger printer/larger gantry the G2Z XL will be better option: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/ldo-galileo-2-g2z-xl-for-voron-v2-4-micron-plus

Does not include printed parts. More Info on printed parts required: https://github.com/JaredC01/Galileo2

A custom-designed 9:1 MJF and Aluminum planetary gearbox, with a custom 9T stepper that features 20% higher surface area than the existing 10T designs (5mm tall spur gear vs 4mm tall spur gear) for increased wear protection and better power transfer from the stepper to the gearbox. The gearbox also follows the rules of planetary gearboxes, where the sun (spur) gear needs to be divisible by the number of planets for proper meshing and loading of the planets (3 planets, 9T spur).

Documentation: 

See latest printer parts and configuration information: https://github.com/JaredC01/Galileo2

Klipper settings for G2Z:

[stepper_z]

rotation_distance: 40
gear_ratio: 9:1
microsteps: 32

[tmc2209 stepper_z]

run_current: 0.8

What is Included: 

Part Bom:

QTY Item
1 9T 20mm pancake stepper
1 Ring Gear Housing (MJF adjusted size file)
3 Planetary Gears (MJF adjusted size file)
1 Planetary Carrier Shaft (Aluminum), spider shaft
3 MR115 Bearings

products.title: LDO Voron Trident (Rev D) 300 Cube - 3D Printer Kit
products.body_html:
Does NOT include the 3D printed parts/PIF Service

For information regarding this kit please visit: LDO Documentation Page

  • This Rev D kit include Raspberry Pi (PI 4B 1GB) and Revo Hotend, so you parts you need is printed parts. 

For information regarding this kit please visit: LDO Documentation Page

PROMO: $100 DREMC Filament Voucher (Emailed once kit has been sent, or contact us and we can invoice this kit with filament credited), Expires on 30th January 2026

Out of Stock? Pre Order Listing: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/ldo-trident-kit-300mm-cube

2024 D Edition (order after 12/06/2024)

  1. Based on 2.4R2 but with more LDO features.
  2. Include Raspberry Pi 4B (1gb)
  3. LDO High Flow Revo Voron – customized by E3D. (same as V0-S1) 0.4mm & 0.6mm Nozzle
  4. Customized Full coverage Silicone Bed Heater, better match LDO design. (Same as Trident Kit)
  5. New Control Boards: Nitehawk SB USB Toolhead Board & Leviathan Control Board
  6. Bondtech IDGA
  7. COB LED Strip & Include LDO specific printed parts & pre assembled magnet sheet. 

Features & Extras

  • Stainless Steel Linear Rails - No more worrying about rusty rails. Remember to properly lubricate your linear rails!
  • Toolhead PCB - Our kit includes Nitehawk SB toolhead PCB.
  • Brass Heatset Insert Tool - We've included a custom machined brass tip for your soldering iron, use it to install heatset inserts with ease! Check here for more information.
  • Pre-cut & Pre-wired - Our kit includes all necessary wiring: cut to the right length and pre-crimped or soldered to their respective parts. See our detailed wiring guide here.
  • Touch Screen Display - We've replaced the standard 12864 LCD with an IPS Capacitive Touch Display to use with KlipperScreen.
  • LED Lighting - Bring lighting to your Voron with included COB LED strips and all necessary wiring!
  • Nevermore Filter - Instead of the stock exhaust we include parts for an the Nevermore Micro V5 by 0ndsk4 (carbon pellets not included due to shipping restrictions).
  • Klicky Mod -  Instead of the included Omron inductive probe, We also provide the parts to build your machine using the optional Klicky mod by jlas1.
  • Small Tools - We include a small set of hex wrenches for all the fasteners used in the build (Preparing your own set of good quality hex wrenches is still recommended). Also included is a small flat head screwdriver that is useful in a surprising number of situations.
  • 2mm Drill Bit - Metric drill bits may not be very common in some parts of the world, so we included one. Use it to ream the filament path in your printed extruder parts.

Tips

  • Take advantage of the Voron on Discord: https://discord.gg/voron. The community is very active on Discord and the users are very helpful on the #voron_1_trident_questions channel.
  • Since printed parts are NOT included with the kit, it is recommended get them from through the Voron Print It Forward program if you are unable to print them for yourself.  They will provide the essential parts for a very reasonable cost to get your printer working.
  • Download Fusion 360 and get a free license to view the 3D model of the printer. The 3D model is a very useful reference when you encounter anything in the manual that is ambiguous or unclear.
  • Check out Nero 3D and Steve Build's Youtube channels, both are part of the Voron team and have tons of useful videos for building Vorons.
  • Print a Voron Cube, then print a Steppy!
  • Get a serial number once you finish building your Voron.

Guides

  • Build Notes & Tips - Read this guide for LDO specific build notes and tips that will make your build experience much smoother.
  • Printed Parts Guide (LDO supplement) - Are you planning on printing parts before the kit arrives? Read our supplementary print guide (Rec.A; Rev.C; Rev.D)to see which parts to print/replace/omit.
  • Wiring Guide - We created this supplementary wiring guide to go along with the included cable kit. We recommend reading the guide ahead of time: Some cable routing is required while you assemble the mechanical components.
  • Tuning Guide - We highly recommend reading over this very detailed tuning guide by Ellis to help print out the best possible looking parts.
  • Cable Chain Guide - See our short guide here for tips on our included cable chains (also known as drag chains).


Build/Review Videos

  • Steve Builds LDO Trident Stream

products.title: Revo™ High Temperature HTA / HTA High Flow Nozzles
products.body_html:
These HTA Revo nozzles are high-temperature, abrasive-resistant nozzles. If your printing application also requires high flow, check out our High Flow HTA nozzles.

Much like ObXidian, HTA nozzles have a hardened steel tip, copper carrier and copper spreader segment to optimise the transmission of heat to the heatsink. The nozzle is then coated with Chromium Nitride to provide additional abrasive resistance, corrosion prevention and non-stick properties for printing up to 500°C.

High Flow HTA nozzles are high-temperature, high flow, abrasion-resistant nozzles. Much like ObXidian, these nozzles have a hardened steel tip, copper carrier and copper spreader segment to optimise the transmission of heat to the heatsink. The nozzle is then coated with Chromium Nitride to provide abrasive resistance, additional corrosion prevention and non-stick properties for printing up to 500°C.    

Please note:   

Whilst HF HTA nozzles can be used with 40W & 60W HeaterCores, they will be temperature limited to 300°C. To print up to 500°C, we advise that you upgrade to one of our Revo High Temperature Hotside kits. 

Product includes: (SF= Standard Flow, HF= High Flow)

  • 1 x 0.25mm or 0.4mm or 0.6mm or 0.8mm HT Nozzle (Depending on Selection)

Higher Flow.  

Revo HF HTA increases your setup's volumetric flow rate, enabling you to print high temperature, abrasive materials faster!  

How does this work?  

Revo HF HT-A maintains the exact same form factor as standard Revo HotEnds; this means there is no need to adjust your pre-existing mount and fan duct setups! These High Flow nozzles use a unique custom internal geometry to increase the surface area for improved thermal transfer to the filament.

products.title: Revo HT Hotside Block Only
products.body_html:
This plated copper HeaterBlock allows you to reach up to 500°C with your Revo system (providing you use a PT100 or PT1000), unlocking the possibilities of printing high-temperature filaments such as Ultem and PEEK.

Kit includes:

  • 2 x M3 x 3 grub screw
  • 2 x M2 x 6 socket head screw
  • 1 x HT Block

FAQ

Why do you need to wear gloves when handling?

We recommend the use of gloves when handling high temperature nozzles and blocks as the oils from your hands off gas at high temperatures resulting in an odour and increased probability for accelerated corrosion of component parts.

Why doesn’t the high-temperature Hotside have a HeaterCore like the standard Revo?

From our extensive research and development (including 1000+ hours at temperature), we found that using a traditional block and cartridge setup, whilst maintaining the ease of use of the Revo nozzles, provided the most reliable, robust solution for extremes of temperature.

products.title: PolyMax™ Max PC Black 1.75mm 3kg Spool
products.body_html:
PolyMax™ PC is a durable and toughness enhanced PolyCarbonate that outperform ABS, ASA, PETG and PLA under almost every varying deformation test.

  • Tough Polymaker PC.
  • Toughness enhanced to offer improved impact strength compared to PolyLite™ PC.
  • Best-in-class toughness and mechanical strength for functional applications.
  • Great thermal properties, up to 114.1℃ (HDT 0.45MPa) / 113℃ Glass transition temperature.
  • Improved printability compared to other PC filaments.

 

PolyMax™ is a family of advanced 3D printing filaments produced with Polymaker’s Nano-reinforcement technology, to deliver exceptional mechanical properties and printing quality. PolyMax™ PC (formerly known as PC-Max™) is an engineered PC filament combining excellent strength, toughness, heat resistance and printing quality. It is the ideal choice for a wide range of engineering applications. 

 
FEATURES
  • Best-in-class Toughness - PolyMax™ PC is an engineered PC filament combining best in class toughness & mechanical strength to deliver outstanding performance in a wide range of demanding applications. These outstanding mechanical properties are achieved through the implementation of Polymakers Nano-reinforcement technology which enables PolyMax™ PC  to outperform ABS, ASA, PETG and PLA under almost every varying deformation test, and drastically improves the impact resistance when compared to PolyLite™ PC.
  • Heat Resistant - PolyMax™ PC offers better heat resistance than a wide variety of material types, withstanding temperatures well above 110 ºC.
  • Improved Printability - PolyMax™ PC has been engineered specifically with compatibility and usability in mind. PolyMax™ PC not only offers excellent properties and print quality, but also benefits in printability when compared to other PC filaments. With a lower extrusion temperature (250 - 270˚C), PolyMax™ PC is an accessible PC filament that can be printed on a wider range of 3D printers. 90°C heated bed required.
  • Uncompromised Quality - Polymakers leading quality control process and rigorous in-house testing ensure reliable printing and consistency across spools and batches.

products.title: Polymaker PolyTerra™ Dual PLA 3D Printer Filament 1.75mm
products.body_html:
PolyTerra™ PLA Dual is a dichromatic matte PLA 3D printing filament that is manufactured with two different colours to give models a striking dual-coloured effect. Based on Polymakers PolyTerra™ Matte formula, this bioplastic filament is sourced naturally to provide ease of use, printing quality, speed and reliability. It is the perfect choice for creating colourful models with a smooth matte surface finish that hides the layers

Features

  •  Dichromatic Matte Finish - PolyTerra™ Dual PLA is a high quality dual colour matte filament that offers a beautiful and dynamic colour transition effect for your 3D prints[1] delivering a fun multi-colour filament for hobbyists, educators and small businesses. Print parts with a beautiful matte surface finish and unleash your imagination with Polymakers fun and vibrant dual colour range.
  • Optimized for Support - PolyTerra™ Dual PLA has been engineered with excellent support removal properties, enabling users to more easily break away support or rafts from the surface of their prints.
  • High Speed Capable - Polymaker have engineered the base PolyTerra™ PLA formula with ideal flow properties to deliver a filament which is capable of high speed printing (only on suitable hardware).
  • Bioplastic Matte PLA Formula - PolyTerra™ Dual PLA is based on a newly developed material from Polymaker called FBC (Fully Bio Compound). It is a compound of high quality Ingeo PLA compounded with naturally occurring elements. The result is a PLA filament with less plastic content that feels softer and more ductile / less brittle on the spool. Polymakers FBC formula ​contains less PLA plastic to degrade which improves the speed of degradation under specific industrial conditions. Like other PLA's, the degradation rate is still very slow in ambient temperatures.
  • Ductility (X-Y) - PolyTerra™ Dual PLA is softer than regular PLA, delivering improved ductility in the horizontal X-Y axis than standard PLA formulations. Whereas a test bar in standard PLA will snap when bent, PolyTerra™ Dual PLA will tend to gradually bend and fracture in the horizontal axis.
  • Compatibility / Jam-Free™- PolyTerra™ Dual PLA is compatible with a wide range of 3D printers and is manufactured with Polymakers  Jam-Free™ technology which leads to excellent printing quality with zero risk of nozzle jams caused by heat creep [2]. PolyTerra™ Dual PLA works well on most printing surface with a thin layer of glue stick applied, no heated bed is required but can sometimes be used at 40 - 50°C for better results (maximum 60°C).
  • Uncompromised Quality - PolyTerra™ Dual PLA filament is made with the highest quality ingredients including Ingeo® from Natureworks; a high quality PLA material produced from rapidly renewable plant resources in the US. Combining Polymakers innovative R&D technologies, compounding and extrusion systems with Natureworks Ingeo® resins produces a reliable 3D printing filament to print beautiful and accurate models.
[2] Heat creep is the the process of heat spreading irregularly throughout the hot end, one common example is with all metal hot end designs. Once heat creeps towards the cold end, the PLA filament softens prematurely in the cold end and expands resulting in a jam. Polymakers Jam-Free™ technology increases the heat resistance of the filament itself (not the printed part) to 100˚C which prevents the filament from prematurely softening in the cold end and can still melt rapidly once entering the heating zone.

  • Hardened abrasion-resistant nozzles developed to last a long time. 3D printing with abrasives such as carbon fiber, glow-in-the-dark PLA or even filled filaments like woodfill all take their toll on a standard nozzle.
  • These nozzles are fully integrated into the E3D Ecosystem and will fit V6, and Titan Aero V6 Hotend, and are compatible with Prusa 3D printers.
  • Versatile Compatibility: Print with any filament, from standard PLA to abrasive carbon-embedded filaments.

  • Compatible with E3D V6 Heat Block
  • Compatible with E3D PT100 V6 Heat Block
  • Compatible with M6 threaded port third-party custom Heat Block

Do Note: Hardened steel steel tip nozzle with copper main body does usually does not require temperature change 

Filled filament such as sparkle/cf/gf we recommended 0.6mm+ nozzle. 

Why Choose Hardened Steel & Copper?

  • Opting for hardened steel and copper components offers a valuable advantage. Copper-plated nozzles prove to be an economical solution for extending the filament compatibility of your 3D printer, particularly when working with high-temperature filaments. These nozzles serve as direct replacements in the aftermarket, offering an exceptional balance between cost and quality in the market.
  • Crafted to withstand extreme temperatures, this nozzle demonstrates remarkable durability, capable of handling temperatures up to 450°C. The copper alloy with high-temperature resistance facilitates effective heat conduction and retention, setting it apart from most conventional nozzles. Additionally, the nickel plating plays a role in minimizing filament adhesion to the nozzle.
  • Incorporating a hardened steel tip insert, this nozzle is specifically designed for use with abrasive filaments, ensuring longevity that goes beyond the lifespan of the printer itself. This all-in-one solution encompasses the ideal combination of materials to deliver exceptional performance.

products.title: Genuine Duet 3 Mainboard 6HC v1.02c
products.body_html:
The Duet 3 Mainboard 6HC is a comprehensive, high-performance controller designed for 3D printers, CNC machines, and similar equipment. Featuring six high-current stepper drivers, four high-current outputs, six fan connections, and extensive onboard I/O, it can directly manage numerous devices. Additionally, its functionality can be expanded significantly through CAN-FD connected expansion boards.

The Duet 3 series offers unparalleled flexibility in machine design with powerful mainboards, expansion boards, tool boards, and customizable expansion modules. This sophisticated hardware is powered by the cutting-edge RepRapFirmware 3 operating on the Duet 3 Mainboard, with the option to use DuetSoftwareFramework on a single-board computer.

 

FEATURES
Processor   Powerful 32bit Atmel ATSAME70: ARM Cortex-M7 microcontroller running at up to 300MHz
 Expansion    CAN-FD BUS for connecting multiple expansion boards and tools
Connectivity Dedicated SPI Bus to Single Board Computer (SBC), or, alternatively, connect over an Ethernet network
Stepper Drivers    6x TMC2160/5160 high-current drivers with the latest Trinamic features. Maximum motor current 6.3A peak per phase (4.45A RMS) 
High current outputs 1x15A and 3x 5A PWM outputs for heated bed, extruders and similar
Medium current outputs 6 PWM controllable outputs for fans or similar. 3 of these support 4 wire fans including tacho reading
IO Nine I/O connectors with 3.3V output signal level and 30V-tolerant inputs
Temperature Measurement 4 thermistor/PT1000 inputs. Support for two temperature daughterboards for up to 4 PT100 or thermocouple sensors
Supply Voltage 12-48V
Firmware  Runs RepRapFirmware 3.x – Supports all common machine geometries, easily configurable for your specific machine requirement

products.title: Bigtreetech SKRat V1.0 Motherboard For 3D Printer
products.body_html:
The SKRat controller board is the result of a cooperation between Rat Rig and BTT. We found that no other boards on the market were currently offering all the power, connectivity and exact feature set in one place, so we set out to develop a new board based on our requisites.

With powerful DC rails to cover our demanding cooling needs, switchable fan voltages, flashing over USB, dedicated 5V Pi header, and lots of connectivity, the SKRat is a true powerhouse of a motherboard in a small package.

The SKRat is supported in RatOS 2.0 for an easy Klipper experience. Regarding printer compatibility, the SKRat is ideal for any Klipper based printer with requirements up to 5 drivers, perfect for the V-Minion as well as V-Core with toolboard setups.

Features:

  • 5 drivers - small form factor for small printers.
  • Flashes via DFU over USB.
  • 5/12/24V Individually selectable fan voltage
  • 5A RMS / 6A peak 5V rail and dedicated Pi power header
  • 3A 12V rail for powering 4028 fans
  • 2x 4-pin fan headers, no more 100% fan speed before the board boots, easy wiring and opto-coupled tachometer pins.
  • 4x 2-pin controllable fan headers
  • Dedicated SPI header for ADXL345 connection
  • MAX31865 for PT100 support.
  • 5 Thermistors
  • 2 Heater ports
  • Neopixel port
  • CANBUS port
  • DIAG jumpers for all drivers
  • Probe port with NPN support and selectable voltage.

What is Included:

  • 1x BigTreeTech SKRat V1.0 Motherboard
  • Jumpers Pack
  • 1x USB Cable Type A to USB-C

products.title: Nozzle Mount ADXL345 Accelerometer by provok3d / Boxxy
products.body_html:
Finally a PCB that mounts exactly where you need to measure resonance! A Nozzle mountable adxl pcb for measuring resonances and tuning input shaper.

Very important: while this board is attached do not heat the hotend!

Features 

  • Pre Flashed with Ampon for quick setup
  • STM32 Based
  • Nozzle mounting

Designed and manufactured by Boxxy from Provok3d the new Nozzle Accelerometer is a solution that makes the best ressonance readings of the market because it’s hard mounted to the nozzle itself.  It fits all printers with a v6 nozzle and it’s designeded to make Klipper’s input shaping much easier by simplifying the wiring and config for measuring resonances. You just need this PCB and a USB-C cable that we also provide as optional. Just Plug and Play! This product is pre-flashed with Ampon but can also be flashed with Klipper.

How to read Input shaper/Belt shaper and comparisons  By The Original Reth  >HERE< And >HERE<

A great write up showing comparisons by Einstein’s V2  >HERE<

The hole in the PCB is designed to fasten the device directly onto the heater block with the nozzle “hard mounting”, which eliminates the need for additional hardware and reduces installation complexity. The device can be easily installed and removed from the heater block with the nozzle without the need for additional tools.

When it comes to mounting an accelerometer, hard mounting is generally considered to be a better option compared to using plastic mounting.

Here are some reasons why:
  • Better accuracy: Hard mounting an accelerometer directly onto the surface of the test object provides a more accurate measurement of the vibration. This is because the accelerometer is in direct contact with the object, and there is no potential for the accelerometer to shift or move during testing, which could introduce errors in the measurement. In contrast, plastic mounting can introduce some flexibility or movement between the accelerometer and the test object, which can lead to inaccuracies in the measurement.
  • Increased sensitivity: Hard mounting an accelerometer can increase its sensitivity to low-level vibrations. By mounting the accelerometer directly onto the surface of the test object, it can pick up even subtle vibrations that might not be detected using a plastic mounting. This can be particularly important for applications where precise measurement of low-level vibrations is critical.

Options available:

  • 1x Nozzle ADXL345 already pre-flashed with Ampon
  • 1x Nozzle ADXL345 already pre-flashed with Ampon + 1.8 meters long USB-C to USB-A cable

Author, credits and partnership: https://provok3d.com/product/nozzle-adxl-board/ 

Pictures from Boxxy, Simon Vez from Vzbot, Rogerlz, Diem

products.title: ZS Hardened Steel Tip & Copper Nozzle for Creality K1 / K1 Max 2023
products.body_html:
This Hardened Steel Tip & Plated Copper nozzle is designed to fit Creality K1 and K1 Max 3D printers. The hardened steel and plated copper construction ensures long-term performance and durability compared to other nozzles. Enjoy smoother, more efficient builds with increased nozzle longevity.

Product Include

  • 1pc K1 Hardened Steel Tip with DLC coating Compatible Nozzle

Size available:

  • 0.4mm
  • 0.6mm
  • 0.8mm

Documentation: 

Note: Ensure you double check your K1 Max, as some newer unit from 2024 are shipping with integrated nozzle/heat break. If that is case, please search K1C hotend/nozzle. 

Suitable direct replacement to Creality 4004020070

Suitable for filled abrasive CF/GF filaments 

Note: This is suitable for volcano hotend but this will nozzle is taller and require adjustment to your z off-set (if you using probe) or may require some changes to part cooling duct for optimal part cooling performance. 

Why Choose Hardened Steel & Copper?

  • Opting for hardened steel and copper components offers a valuable advantage. Copper-plated nozzles prove to be an economical solution for extending the filament compatibility of your 3D printer, particularly when working with high-temperature filaments. These nozzles serve as direct replacements in the aftermarket, offering an exceptional balance between cost and quality in the market.
  • Crafted to withstand extreme temperatures, this nozzle demonstrates remarkable durability, capable of handling temperatures up to 450°C. The copper alloy with high-temperature resistance facilitates effective heat conduction and retention, setting it apart from most conventional nozzles. Additionally, the nickel plating plays a role in minimizing filament adhesion to the nozzle.
  • Incorporating a hardened steel tip insert, this nozzle is specifically designed for use with abrasive filaments, ensuring longevity that goes beyond the lifespan of the printer itself. This all-in-one solution encompasses the ideal combination of materials to deliver exceptional performance.

Documentation: https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000348046-creality-k1-how-to-replace-the-nozzle-and-clean-the-heat-break

products.body_html:
This 6x3mm N52 neodymium cylinder magnet delivers strong magnetic force in a compact size. Its durable nickel coating resists corrosion and wear, making it reliable for industrial, electronic, and DIY uses. Perfect for sensors, motors, and magnetic assemblies requiring consistent strength and durability.

Magnet Specifications 

  • Sold Individually.
  • Vendor: LDO
  • Temperature Rated: 80c 
  • Material: NdFeB, Grade N52
  • Gaussian Value: 4000
  • Plating/Coating: Ni-Cu-Ni (Nickel)
  • 6mm diameter x 3mm thickness
  • Tolerances ±0.05mm x ±0.05mm

Magnet Safety Warning

Please read the following before handling magnets:

Magnets, especially Rare Earth Neodymium types, are stronger than expected and must be handled safely. Always wear gloves and eye protection when using large magnets to avoid injury. Keep magnets away from credit cards, electronics, and sensitive devices as they can cause damage. Avoid snapping magnets together to prevent chipping. Do not expose magnets to temperatures above 80°C, as this can weaken them. Store different magnet types separately to avoid demagnetisation. Individuals with pacemakers should not handle magnets. Keep all magnets out of children’s reach.

products.title: E3D Revo™ Brass Belt Nozzle
products.body_html:
Engineered especially for belt printing, these belt nozzles feature an extended reach that allows 45° printing with Revo HotEnds. You can change nozzles in less than 60 seconds without tools or heat-tightening—simply use your fingers.

Experiment freely.  

Revo Belt Nozzles are available in three sizes—0.4mm, 0.6mm, and 0.8mm—offering effortless nozzle changes that encourage experimenting with different extrusion widths. Quickly configure your 3D printer for either ultra-fine or thick layers, enabling faster production of large prints or detailed high-resolution small objects.

Frustration-free.  

Every Revo Nozzle combines the nozzle and HeatBreak into a single preassembled unit, eliminating the need for hot tightening and reducing the risk of assembly errors. This design prevents HotEnd leaks, ensuring consistent and reliable 3D printing performance.

Rapid identification.  

Easily recognize nozzle sizes with the colour-coded silicone sock. Each Revo Nozzle features clearly engraved size markings, eliminating any confusion when identifying the correct nozzle.

Please note:  

  • Revo™ Nozzles are not compatible with V6-style heater blocks 
  • You may need to adjust your Z offset when changing nozzles.

products.title: CNC Kitchen Volcano Adapter Version 3
products.body_html:
• NEW: Nickel-plated copper adapter
  • High thermal conductivity copper
  • Low-friction nickel plating
  • Almost step-less design with 2mm hex for optimal extrusion performance
  • Improved design for hot-tightening
  • 2 mm hex key included
  • Use any standard length V6 nozzle on a printer with volcano hotend
  • Specially designed to be used together with Bondtechs CHT nozzle to improve the flow performance of your volcano hotend
  • Usable up to 400°C
  • Suitable for all materials, even abrasive ones (CF, wood, glow in the dark)

Intended use

This nickel-plated copper adapter enables the installation of any standard length V6 nozzle into a Volcano heater block by compensating for the 8.5 mm length discrepancy between standard and Volcano nozzles. It removes the need for multiple nozzle types, allowing all standard nozzles to be compatible with a Volcano heater block.

Installation

Stick the adapter onto a 2.0 mm Straight Hex Key and carefully screw it into the HOT heater block from the bottom. The temperature should be at least your usual printing temperature. Please don’t use a Ball End Hex Key because that can strip the hex in the adapter. Tighten it carefully to around 0.5 – 1.0 Nm. Install your standard length V6 nozzle as usual.

Make sure there is a small gap between the nozzle and the heater block. This ensures that you tightened the nozzle against the adapter and not the heater block. Otherwise, plastic might leak through the threads.

Credits: This adapter is based on an idea from Nitram who is the father of the VolcoMosq heater block!

Product History/Changes:

  • Note: Order after 9th April 2025 will be shipping version 3.

products.title: Revo™ High Flow Brass Nozzles
products.body_html:
Switching to high-flow 3D printing takes only 30 seconds with these nozzles! Designed with optimized internal geometry, the high-flow nozzles maintain the same size as a standard E3D Revo™. Compatible with your current 40W HeaterCores, they boost flow rates while using standard printing materials.

High Flow Abrasive Resistant Version: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/revo-obxidian-nozzle

Key features: 

- Maximum temperature: 300°C 

- Filament diameter: 1.75mm

- Voltage: 24V 

Compatible:

  • Revo Micro, Revo Six, Revo Voron, Revo CR, Revo Hemera XS, Revo Prusa MK3, Revo Prusa Mini, Revo MicroSwiss NG, Revo Biqu H2 V2 

Frustration-free.  Each Revo Nozzle is a preassembled nozzle and HeatBreak in one unit, so there’s no hazardous hot tightening and no chance of incorrect assembly. Say goodbye to frustrating HotEnd leaks and enjoy reliable 3D printing! 

Higher Flow.  Revo™ High Flow increases your setup's volumetric flow rate, enabling you to print faster! 

How does this work?  Unlike previous E3D High Flow Hotends (Volcano and SuperVolcano), Revo™ High Flow maintains the exact same form factor as standard Revo HotEnds; this means there is no need to adjust your pre-existing mount and fan duct setups! Revo™ High Flow uses a unique custom internal geometry to increase the surface area for improved thermal transfer to the filament. 

More nozzle sizes.  Revo™ High Flow unlocks higher flow for existing 0.4mm, 0.60mm, and 0.80mm nozzle sizes and adds 1.00mm, 1.20mm, and 1.40mm nozzle sizes to your arsenal. 

Including the standard Revo™ nozzle range, which is interchangeable, Revo allows for a wide range of printing applications with 0.15mm nozzles all the way up to 1.40mm! 

Rapid identification.  Identify nozzle sizes at a glance, thanks to a colour-coded silicone sock. Plus, each Revo Nozzle has 'HF' and its size engraved into it with easy-to-read numbers, so there are no confusing identification markers to learn! 

Lets talk numbers.   Empirically providing useful volumetric flow rate figures is a challenging task. To make E3D figures as close to real use cases as possible, E3D have stuck to a semi-standardised testing procedure. For full details on E3D Volumetric flow rate findings, please refer to E3D Documentation . 

Summary:  

Based on printing with PLA at 220°C, compared with Revo standard brass nozzles.

0.40 mm nozzles see a 38% increase in the volumetric flow rate (18mm³/s) 

0.60 mm nozzles see a 57% increase in volumetric flow rate (22mm³/s) 

0.80 mm nozzles see a 64% increase in volumetric flow rate (28mm³/s)

1.00 mm nozzles have a volumetric flow rate of 35mm³/s 

1.20 mm nozzles have a volumetric flow rate of 37mm³/s 

1.40 mm nozzles have a volumetric flow rate of 37mm³/s 

It is important to note that when E3D subject other high-flow hotends on the market to the same testing procedure, the maximum flow rate claims fall short when appropriate print temperature, track widths and layer heights are used. 

Similarly, E3D have benchmarked standard filaments that are not necessarily designed to be used in high-flow situations. If you use HTPLA, PLA³ filament or other specifically high-flow designed materials, the maximum volumetric flow rate you can achieve with Revo™ High flow is staggering!

products.title: Cookiecad Glittery Filament PLA Filament 1.75mm - 1kg
products.body_html:
Cookiecad are really excited to introduce you to Cookiecad PLA, beautiful filament in unique and interesting colours.

This is Funfetti. It is a clear transparent PLA filament filled with rainbow glitter.

This is Star Dust. It is a glittery black filament. The visual effect of the glitter hides layer lines and creates a striking and professional finish.

Fairy Floss - it has three translucent colors on one spool plus silver glitter! The color will change slowly over time, so small objects will only contain one color. You can print multiple items at a time, large items, or increase infill to get more of the color change into a single print. The colors will fade from pink, to purple, to blue and back to pink. Every color in the transition is beautiful. This roll is so much fun to print with!

This is Blue Star Stuff. It is a translucent PLA filament with a hint of blue, filled with silver glitter.

This is Purple Star Stuff. It is a translucent PLA filament with a hint of purple, filled with silver glitter.

This is Mint Star Stuff. It is a translucent PLA filament with a hint of mint green, filled with silver glitter.

Empty Plastic Spool ~177g

If you haven't printed with glitter filaments before, please note: Glitter filaments have a higher chance of clogging.

A >0.4mm nozzle is recommended for glitter/Funfetti filled. 

Printing Settings

For best results, dry filament using a filament drier before use. Keep in an airtight container for medium/long term storage with silica desiccant. [If you hear popping or inconsistent extrusion while purging filament, suggest drying before printing for best results] Filament Drying Guide

Note: Transparent/translucent PLA is more prone to be very brittle when wet state or more stiff/brittle normally due to additive used for translucent , we recommended drying before use and avoid using in AMS/CFS (Auto Materials Systems) to avoid materials breaking during a print for better reliability.  

Nozzle Temperature 190°C - 235°C
Build Plate Temperature 50°C - 60°C*
Build Surface Material Works well with most common build surfaces.
Build Surface Treatment Typically none required. Some surfaces such as glass work best with PVA glue stick or Magigoo .
Cooling Fan ON
Printing Speed 20 mm/s - 40 mm/s
Retraction The ideal retraction settings vary from printer to printer. If you find the retraction settings are causing gaps in your part, the following settings may help.
Direct Drive: Retraction distance of 0.5 - 1mm with retraction speed of 20mm/s
Bowden: Retraction distance of 2 - 3mm with retraction speed of 20 - 40mm/s
Drying Recommendation ~50°c for 4-6hrs (Only dry if filament is wet, over drying/repeat drying can damage filament) (Filament Drying Guide)
Storage Keeping filament in an airtight container with new/dried desiccant.

Based on 0.4 mm nozzle. Printing conditions may vary with different printers and nozzle diameters.

variants.title: Gold Dust Clear with Gold Glitter

products.title: GammaMaster® Nozzle Abrasive Resistant- Reprap / V6
products.body_html:
The Gamma Master® Nozzle is the next evolution in nozzle technology, forged from the latest advancements in metallurgy and surface preparation technology. For too long, you have had to settle for poor thermal performance when printing with abrasive filaments, but Gamma Master is the best of both worlds. It's the first RepRap nozzle designed for abrasive filament printing that doesn't sacrifice thermal conductivity.

Thermal Performance

Crafted from a proprietary hardened alloy, the GammaMaster Nozzle features thermal performance similar to that of a standard brass nozzle while maintaining its abrasive-resistant qualities. GammaMaster is 2.7 times more thermally conductive when compared to hardened steel nozzles, meaning you no longer have to raise your nozzle temperature to print with abrasive filaments.

Abrasion Resistant

With a Limited Lifetime Warranty against abrasive wear, the GammaMaster Nozzle will print the entire gamut of thermoplastic materials. From basic PLA to glass fiber reinforced PEI, the GammaMaster Nozzle excels at printing abrasive filaments with a Rockwell C hardness level of 63.

Anti-Adhesive Surface
GammaMaster features our new Low Gamma™ coating that reduces the surface energy of the nozzle and prevents the accumulation of plastic around the nozzle's tip. With a measured surface energy of <30 dynes/cm, the Low Gamma coating allows for easier cleanup, fewer failed prints, and a better printing experience. Unlike PTFE-based coatings, GammaMaster’s surface is rated to high printing temperatures*, allowing you to reap the non-stick benefits with virtually any material.

Multiple Geometries

Available in both RepRap and AP3X™ geometries, the GammaMaster Nozzle is suitable for any hotend that uses standard M6 x 1.0 threads. Our RepRap geometry is the default nozzle geometry you're probably used to, ideal for traditional, 3-axis FDM printing. Our AP3X geometry comes to a point with an added 2 mm of tip length, making this geometry ideal for belt printing and non-planar printing applications.

Best Warranty in the Business

We are proud to offer a Limited Lifetime Warranty against abrasive wear for the GammaMaster Nozzle. Please note, certain exotic filaments, like Glow-in-the-Dark and Tungsten Carbide filled, are not covered under this warranty. If you are looking to print with specialty filaments, check out our Vanadium™ Nozzle.

For more information, read the full warranty here.

Additional Features and Benefits

  • *Low Gamma coating rated to 380°C, nozzle substrate rated to 500°C
  • Engraved orifice size on three sides for easy nozzle identification
  • Compatible with common metric (6 mm) and standard (1/4 in) socket tools for straightforward installation
  • RepRap style, M6 x 1.0 threads with a 7 mm thread length (12.5 mm overall length for RepRap geometry and 14.5 mm overall length for AP3X)
  • 100% Made in the USA

Technical Specifications

Substrate Temperature Rating 500°C
Low Gamma™ Temperature Rating 380°C
Hex 6 mm (1/4 in)
Thread M6 x 1.0
Thread Length 7 mm
Overall Length (RepRap) 12.5 mm
Overall Length (AP3X™) 14.5 mm
Warranty Limited Lifetime

 

Downloads

GammaMaster Nozzle (RepRap) Reference Dimensions
GammaMaster Nozzle (RepRap) STEP File
GammaMaster Nozzle (AP3X) Reference Dimensions
GammaMaster Nozzle (AP3X) STEP File

products.title: Bigtreetech Pad 7 with Pre-installed CB1 Core Board
products.body_html:
The BTT Pad 7 is a 7-inch IPS touchscreen tablet designed specifically for 3D printing enthusiasts. It comes with Klipper and KlipperScreen pre-installed and features a high-quality 7-inch IPS touchscreen. Also, it is not only a Klipper screen but also a mini-computer. The built-in CB1 Core Board can be detachable, you can replace it with CM4 and make it a mini-computer.  

Key Features:

  • Improve print quality and speed. Equipped with an ADXL345 accelerometer, it will help improve printing speed and quality remarkably, allowing for faster, more precise, and more reliable 3D printing.

  • Adaptive light screen to protect eyes. The brightness of the screen varies according to the brightness of the environment it is in.

  • DIY Friendly, replaceable built-in CB1 core board. We provide CB1 OS Image as well as source code and other files, so you can edit code and install it on your 3d printer. Or you can choose to replace the CB1 with CM4 and upgrade it to Linux so it can even be a mini-computer.

  • Various interfaces. The tablet supports various interfaces such as USB 2.0, Ethernet, CAN, and SPI, and comes with a SanDisk 32 GB memory card for storage.

  • Wide compatibility. The screen itself can compatible with almost all FDM 3d printers. In addition, this screen is also compatible with BIGTREETECH SKR, Octopus series motherboards, EBB tool boards, etc.

products.title: Bondtech BMG Extruder IDGA
products.body_html:
New Version WITH IDGA Shipping Now!

with new white plastic main gear and integrated drive gear for lower run-out

Now including the new white plastic main gear and assembled with a new method to reduce run-out and improve 3D print´s surface quality.

The Bondtech BMG® extruder combines high performance and resolution with low weight. Together with our proven and highly celebrated Dual-Drive technology you can expect problem free material feeding.

The BMG® works in both bowden and direct driven applications. Built-in fitting for the E3D hotend and fits Nema17 stepper motors. Please mind the bowden adapter is not included.

The housing parts are professionally SLS printed in nylon for maximum strength and precision.

This extruder is sold without motor.

  • Weight without motor: 75g
  • E-step value: 415

Bondtech Mini Geared Features

The Bondtech BMG® utilizes an internal gearing ratio of 3:1 together with precision cnc-machined Nickel coated Hardened Steel drive gears to give you a compact powerhouse for all your applications. Whether you require high resolution prints with small nozzles or high-flow prints with big nozzles the optimized gearing ratio combined with our industry leading drive gears provides unparalleled pushing power and lightning fast retractions in a lightweight and compact package.

Bondtech Dual-Drive

Our unique Dual-Drive technology delivers uninterrupted material flow without fear of grinding or slipping in even the most demanding conditions. Bondtech users the world over will attest that even in prints with thousands of retracts our extruders perform flawless, with unmatched precision, and zero damage or degradation to the filament.

Multi-material capability

Our BMG® extruder feeds all material with high reliability, from slippery nylons and soft TPU/TPE filaments to highly rigid and sometimes brittle carbon-filled high-strength materials. The extruder is designed for 1.75 mm filaments, but has been tested to ensure performance of filament from 1.5mm up to 2.0mm allowing for high reliability regardless of the tolerance of the filament used. The filament path is fully guided throughout the extruder body and the housing maintains tight tolerances to the drive gears mitigating the chances of Filament Misfeed when the hotend experiences increased back-pressure or highly flexible filaments are used.

Adjustable tension

The thumbscrew tensioner allows the user to fine-tune the pressure exerted by the drive gears onto the filament. This gives you the power to adjust according to your preferences and to optimize for the type of material you are using.

Quick-Release

To be able to do material changes in a snap, simply activate the Quick-Release lever to release the tension and pull the material to be changed out of the extruder, keep it activated and insert the new material.

Multi-application design

This extruder can be used in a Bowden or direct setups and gives you the flexibility to choose what works best for your application. In addition it features an integrated hotend retention method compatible with the E3D-V6 hotends or others using the Groove Mount standard. Mounting your hotend is simple, secure, and wobble free by means of just two bolts.

Flexible mounting options

We have designed a standard mounting bracket, both in CNC and as a 3D printable part that you can download from our stl-archive for free. Our standard mount is CNC-machined in 3 mm aluminum for maximum stability. Please see below for available mounts.

The extruder fits any Nema17 stepper motor with a standard 5 mm shaft. For suitable stepper motors, please select one of the below or use your own motor.

New Design Features

The Motor Gear is now made of Brass
The corrosion resistant material will stop the very low frequency of oxidation issues that happened to the steel gears.

The POM Gear attached to the Main Shaft is now Black
This is a pure aesthetical upgrade to mask out the dirt that shows too much on white.

The Push-Fit is now threaded
It can be removed and/or replaced to make it easier to solve clogs without ruining the BMG®’s housing.

products.title: Heated Hot bed Assembly Kit for CR-6 SE Max - 420x445mm
products.body_html:
Restore the full printing potential of your Creality CR-6 SE Max with this dedicated 24V DC replacement PCB hot bed kit. Designed specifically for this large-format 3D printer, this assembly features a robust 420x445mm aluminium surface that ensures consistent heating across the entire build area. Whether you're dealing with a original bed that damaged, or inconsistent heating, this direct replacement kit provides the perfect foundation for reliable, high-quality prints on your CR-6 SE Max again. 

Key Features & Benefits:

  • Precision Fit for CR-6 SE Max: Engineered as a seamless direct replacement for the original heated bed. The 420x445mm dimensions match your printer perfectly, requiring no modifications, simply swap and reconnect.

  • Aluminium Surface for Superior Performance: Unlike standard PCB beds, this kit features a durable aluminium surface that offers rapid, uniform heat distribution across the entire 420x445mm plate, minimising temperature gradients and reducing the risk of warping in your prints.

  • 24V DC Operation: Specifically designed for the CR-6 SE Max's 24V electrical system, ensuring safe, efficient, and powerful heating performance.

Specifications:

  • Compatibility: Creality CR-6 SE Max

  • Dimensions: 420mm x 445mm (fits build plate area)

  • Surface Material: Aluminium

  • Voltage: 24V DC

  • Type: Direct Replacement Heated Bed Kit (PCB with mounted heater/thermistor)

Package Includes:

products.title: Duet 3 Expansion 1HCL
products.body_html:
The Duet 3 Expansion 1HCL is a CAN-FD connected expansion board that is designed to provide a high current stepper motor driver, combined with multiple interfaces for position feedback. It has a number of peripheral inputs and outputs for functions such as sensing motor temperature, controlling a brake and axis endstop. It connects to the Duet 3 CAN-FD bus using RJ11 connectors (the same as the Duet 3 Mainboard 6HC, Duet 3 expansion boards, and the tool distribution board). Multiple 1HCL boards can be daisy chained on the bus, with power (up to 48V) provided locally. This allows for very large machines to be constructed without a significant wiring burden and signal integrity issues.

Documentation: 

https://docs.duet3d.com/Duet3D_hardware/Duet_3_family/Duet_3_Expansion_1HCL

FEATURES

Processor

ARM Cortex-M4F microcontroller running at 120MHz
Stepper Drivers

TMC2160A stepper driver: SPI controlled, can be run in open loop or closed loop mode. Maximum motor current 6.3A peak per phase (4.45A RMS).
Connectivity

RJ11 CAN In and CAN Out connectors to connect to the Duet 3 CAN-FD bus
TBC

Two medium-current (2.5A max recommended) outputs at VIN or VBRAKE voltage with PWM capability and built-in flyback diodes: out0, out1

    • Optionally provide VBRAKE at a different voltage from VIN to allow (for example) to run the stepper motor at 48V and the brake at 24V.
    • Note the flyback diodes are connected to the voltage being used (VBRAKE or VIN as selected)
General IO

Two 3.3V-level PWM capable output (3mA max), through 470R series resistor: io0.out, io1.out

Two digital inputs with permanent 27K pullup resistors, protected against over-voltage: io0.in, io1.in
Temperature Input

One thermistor/PT1000 input: temp0

This is intended to allow for motor temperature monitoring (potentially couple with a cooling system controlled by one of the outputs)
Voltage

VIN: 12V-48V nominal (the absolute maximum VIN rating is somewhat higher to allow for the overshoot that occurs when the stepper motor is turned off)
Firmware

RepRapFirmware 3.4 and later

PID tuning plugin for Duet Web Control

products.title: LGX Steel Drive Train Upgrade Set
products.body_html:
Push Harder! Full Steel Ahead!

Set of parts made of Hardened Steel to replace the plastic Drive and Main Double Gears on a Bondtech Large Gears eXtruder :

  • LGX;
  • LGX Lite;
  • LGX Lite Mirrored.
Recommended to feed Engineering grade thermoplastics.

 

— Lubrication is mandatory —

These drive gears are made of hardened steel. Without lubrication they will wear your motor gear down.
Use a brush and the supplied lubricant to coat the drive gear teeth.


— Metal gears conduct heat —

To feed PLA or TPU (low Glass Transition Temperature materials)
keep the stepper motor cool (current at, or below, 0.5A).


To use our LGX extruders above our default recommendations:

  • with thicker mounting plates;
  • at higher environment temperatures;
  • at higher stepper motor currents.

The LGX extruders fit very well most filament extrusion applications, but some cases demand additional features or capacity that cannot be enabled by their plastic gear sets.
Those cases are:

1. When the LGX are used with a plate in between the extruder and the stepper motor thicker than our recommendation, and up to a limit.

On the LGX
Optimal Thickness : between 0.3 and 2.3 mm;
Limited to 3.0 mm

On the LGX Lite and LGX Lite Mirrored
Optimal Thickness : 2.5 mm;
Limited to 3.0 mm

2. When the LGX are used in work environments, warmer than our recommendation, and up to a limit.

On the LGX
We recommended Max Environment operating temperature : 70°C
Limited to 90°C

On the LGX Lite and LGX Lite Mirrored
We recommended Max Environment operating temperature : 70°C
Limited to 90°C

3. When the current fed to the LGX stepper motor is higher than our recommendation, and up to the 95% of the rated current.

On the LGX
Rated current: 0.7A.
We recommended between ~0.45 and ~0.60A

On the LGX Lite and LGX Lite Mirrored
Rated current: 1.0A.
We recommended between ~0.45 and ~0.60A

products.title: Duet3D Duet 3 Mini 5+ v1.02
products.body_html:
The Duet 3 Mini 5+ balances value and performance, focused on small and medium size machines that do not need the high power output of the Duet 3 Mainboard 6HC. It provides 5 on board drivers and a full compliment of heaters, fans and IO along with support for a variety of screen options. There are Wifi and Ethernet variants, with the option of using a SBC (Single Board Computer, e.g. Raspberry Pi) for control in the same manner as other Duet 3 mainboards.

The overall aim with the Duet 3 series is to allow for maximum flexibility of machine design through highly capable main boards, expansion boards, smart tool boards and custom expansion modules. The flexibility of configuration and advanced features are enabled by innovative RepRapFirmware 3 running on the Duet 3 Mainboard and optionally DuetSoftwareFramework running on a single board computer.

Documentation: 

https://docs.duet3d.com/Duet3D_hardware/Duet_3_family/Duet_3_Mini_5+_Hardware_Overview

FEATURES

Processor

Powerful 32 Bit Processor (ARM Cortex M4 @120Mhz).
Expansion

Add two more TMC2209 stepper drivers using the Duet 3 Mini 2+ expansion board.
For much more expansion use the CAN-FD BUS for connecting multiple expansion boards and tools.
Connectivity

Both Wifi External Antenna and Ethernet versions.
Dedicated High speed bus to a single board computer (e.g. Raspberry Pi) for the user interface and plugins.
Stepper Drivers

5 Trinamic 2209 stepper drivers running at up to 1.4A RMS, 2A peak with firmware control of the full feature set including up to 256 microstepping, StallGuard 2 and StealthChop2.
High current outputs

3 High current PWM outputs of varying current capacities support a high current heated bed and 2 extruders.
Medium current outputs

4 Medium current outputs designed for 2 wire (x2) and 4 wire (x2) fans
IO

7 IO ports for endstops, probes, filament monitors and other sensors. Inputs are 30V tolerant.
Temperature Measurement

3 thermistor/PT1000 inputs.
Support for two temperature daughterboards for up to 4 PT100 or thermocouple sensors.
Voltage

11V to 25V.
Firmware

Runs RepRapFirmware 3.x – Supports all common machine geometaries, easily configurarable for your specific machine requirements.

The DueX 5 is an expansion board designed for the Duet 2 Wifi and Ethernet, enabling up to 5 extra stepper motor drivers, 5 extruder heater outputs, and 5 endstop inputs with LED indicators. It also adds 6 controlled fan outputs, 5 thermistor inputs, and supports 2 additional thermocouple or PT100 daughter boards. An optional 5V external power input allows powering servos and fans, making it ideal for 3D printers or machines requiring more axes, multiple drivers per axis, or tool changers.

Stepper Drivers

Super quiet TMC2660 stepper drivers with 2.4A Peak per stepper channel.

Support for two temperature daughterboards for up to 4 PT100 or thermocouple sensors.

products.title: LDO V0-S1 Picobilical Kit (PBL) for V0.2
products.body_html:
This kit include upgrade existing Voron 0.1, design is based on V0-Umbilical

Documentation: 

  •  Install Guide LDO DOC

Features: 

  • Rear Motor Mounted PCB Toolhead to simplified wiring
  • Umbicial Cable to allow ease removable of cable loom for maintenance 
  • 2x independent neopixel ports for V0.2 Mini Stealthburner
  • Selectable 5V or 24V for part and hotend fan enabling no new hardware for 0.1 (5v 4006/4007 fans). 
  • On-Board Thermistors for chamber temperature monitoring. 
  • Optical filament sensor

What is Included: 

  • Toolhead pcb
  • Picobilical Frame pcb
  • Raspberry pi gpio pcb
  • Pre crimped Wiring needed to connect the two pcb via molex
  • Miscellaneous screws and connectors for the toolhead board. 

Overview

The Picobilical is composed of the Toolhead PCB, Frame PCB, and Umbilical Cable - which connects the two PCBs. 

  • The Toolhead PCB is a simple PCB that receives all the electrical connections on the printer toolhead and combines them into a single 14pin umbilical connector.
  • The Umbilical Cable connects the Toolhead PCB to the Frame PCB.
  • The Frame PCB is a secondary controller that processes all the signals from the toolhead PCB and communicates directly with the Klipper Host on the Raspberry Pi. This design simplifies electrical wiring because no connections need to be made to the main controller (except for the extruder motor). An additional benefit is that many ports on the main controller are now freed up, and can be used for other mods.

products.title: Duet Magnetic Filament Monitor
products.body_html:
The Duet3D Rotating Magnet Filament Monitor very accurately senses filament movement. Connect it to a Duet 2 or Duet 3 and the controller will use the indicated movement to determine a wide range of extrusion issues including:

  • Filament run out
  • Extruder skipping steps
  • Nozzle starting to jam (causing skipped steps or grinding)
  • Filament beginning to grind in the extruder

It does this so accurately because it is effectively an extruder in reverse. The filament movement rotates a custom machined hobbed magnet assembly; the magnet rotation is sensed and constantly reported to the Duet. This method has proven extremely accurate across a wide range of filaments – frequently capable of pausing the print before a filament jam or other issue has already caused the print to fail.

Kit Only: It comes with a connector pack with the Molex-KK-style housings and crimps to connect the monitor to the Duet.

Documentation:

https://docs.duet3d.com/en/Duet3D_hardware/Accessories/Rotating_Magnet_Filament_Monitor

Configuration:

https://docs.duet3d.com/en/User_manual/Connecting_hardware/Sensors_filament

products.title: Bondtech® DDX™ v3 For Creality
products.body_html:
New Version WITH IDGA Shipping Now!

with new white plastic main gear and integrated drive gear for lower run-out

Now including the new white plastic main gear and assembled with a new method to reduce run-out and improve 3D print´s surface quality.

The Bondtech DDX Direct Drive eXtruder for Creality 3D printers is an upgrade kit that replaces the original bowden extruder with a direct drive extruder setup. It is a high-performance Dual Drive extruder based on the BMG Bondtech Mini Geared.

The Bondtech DDX Direct Drive eXtruder for Creality 3D printers is an upgrade kit that replaces the original bowden extruder with a direct drive extruder setup. It is a high-performance Dual Drive extruder based on the BMG Bondtech Mini Geared.

Multiple Hotends Compatibility

This model was created to be compatible with the original hotend of each compatible Creality model, except with the hotend in CR-10 V2/V3. Users may upgrade the hotend to Copperhead™ or Mosquito™. It is also compatible with users of Micro Swiss hotends. To upgrade the hotend, a specific adapter set is required.

A DDX v3 Adapter set is required to use this product. 

The DDX v3 is much easier to install

With the integrated fan shroud and mount included in the DDX v3 adapter sets, the DDX v3 is even easier to install. Snap the fan to the shroud without using screws. Adjust the height of the shroud with one front access screw.

Using a bed probe with DDX v3

The DDX was designed to allow space for the bed probe to be attached to the x-carriage. In models where there is no space to attach a bed probe like the BL Touch, to the X-carriage, a mount can printed and attached to the right hand side of the DDX.

Bondtech DDX Direct Drive eXtruder

This Direct Drive eXtruder from Bondtech is a high performance, high reliability 1,75mm Dual Drive extruder for Creality 3D printers, based on our very popular BMG. Bondtech’s unique Dual-Drive technology combined with either the factory hotend or for even better performance the industry leading hotends Copperhead™ or Mosquito™ from Slice Engineering gives you a direct drive extruder with problems free material feeding and enables the use of a wider range of materials. The housing parts are printed with PA12 (polyamide) for maximum strength and precision using industrial grade SLS technology.

Make your 3D printer even better

Bondtech DDX Direct Drive eXtruder for Creality is designed to give the user more options – different materials; higher flow and/or wider nozzles; thinner layers – and achieve a higher print quality. The DDX is based on the BMG Bondtech Mini Geared extruder featuring our unique Dual-Drive technology. The DDX housing design provides an effective Hot-End cooling. With the 3:1 gearing ratio, high resolution prints with small nozzles or high flow prints with bigger nozzles can be achieved.

Easy To Setup

For ease of setup the kit is attached to the carriage with only 2 screws.

Product includes:

  • 1x DDX v3 Extruder
  • 1x Nema17 Pancake stepper motor
  • 1x Thumbscrew Assembly
  • 1x 70cm Stepper motor extension cable
  • 1x 60cm PTFE tube
  • 1x 7cm Capricorn tube
  • 4x Zip-ties
  • 3x M3x12mm screw
  • 2x M3x20mm screw
  • 1x M3x10mm button head screw

products.title: Duet 3 Tool Distribution Board v0.5
products.body_html:
This board allows for the connection of up to 4 Duet 3 Toolboards to the Duet 3 Mainboard at one time, greatly simplifying the CAN-FD bus and power wiring.

Tool board power outputs are individually bused, and the CAN-FD bus connections can by bypassed if less than 4 tools are connected.

These can be connected to other Duet 3 CAN-FD bus expansion boards (or other tool distribution boards) via the RJ11 connector for CAN-OUT.

Documentation:

https://docs.duet3d.com/en/Duet3D_hardware/Duet_3_family/Duet_3_Tool_Distribution_Board

FEATURES


Connectivity

CAN IN – RJ11.
CAN OUT – RJ11.
4x CAN Loops to toolboards – JST ZH.
Jumpers to bypass unused loops, Bus termination resistor on board (jumper selectable).
Power

12-32V VIN distributed to 4x power out via 4x 5A fused.
Output power connectors – JST VH.
